translated: If that were so, then the very meaning of the negation of the existence of all the properties of the subject would be the purpose of the chief matter.üîΩWell, then, both would be autonomous doubts.

original: 'o na gnyi ga dogs pa rang rgyud par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te bsdu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na gnyi ga dogs pa rang rgyud par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te bsdu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not so, because there is no inclusion.

original: de'i phyir nye bar ma btags na thal ba'i skyon bsal ba'i 'bras bu can du gyur pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar ma btags na thal ba'i skyon bsal ba'i 'bras bu can du gyur pa na /
translated: Therefore, when the fault of the absurd consequence is removed by the designation,

original: nye bar btags pas nges pa'i chos can rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir de ltar nye bar bkod do //
analyzed: nye bar btags pas nges pa'i chos can rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir de ltar nye bar bkod do //
translated: it is said that the ascertainment of the subject is accomplished by the designation.

original: de dgos par gnas na ni bzlog par 'gyur te phyogs nye bar btags pas bstan pa'i chos can gang yin pa de rtogs na gzhan 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dgos par gnas na ni bzlog par 'gyur te phyogs nye bar btags pas bstan pa'i chos can gang yin pa de rtogs na gzhan 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that were the purpose, then it would be reversed, because when the subject that is indicated by the designation of the position is understood, the other is refuted.

original: gang zhig der nye bar btags par rtogs @8a * //
analyzed: gang zhig der nye bar btags par rtogs @8a * //
translated: What is understood as being designated there?

original: par bya ba de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: par bya ba de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the object of the designation?

original: der nye bar gdags par 'os pa gang yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: der nye bar gdags par 'os pa gang yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is that which is suitable to be designated there.

original: de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúbecause it is one part of that.‚Äù

original: phyogs ni spyi yin la de ni phyogs gcig chos can la nye bar 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs ni spyi yin la de ni phyogs gcig chos can la nye bar 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: A part is a universal, and that is designated as one part of the subject.

original: des na gang zhig 'di'i phyogs gcig yin pa de nyid nye bar gdags par 'os pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub bya'i chos can nges pa de nyid rtogs te de nyid de'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na gang zhig 'di'i phyogs gcig yin pa de nyid nye bar gdags par 'os pa yin pa'i phyir bsgrub bya'i chos can nges pa de nyid rtogs te de nyid de'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, that which is one part of that is suitable to be designated as the subject of the probandum. That very subject is understood, because it is one part of that.

original: de'i phyir phyogs su gdags par 'os pa'i chos can rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gdags par byas la /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyogs su gdags par 'os pa'i chos can rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gdags par byas la /
translated: Therefore, in order to understand the subject that is suitable to be designated as a part, it is designated.

original: de lta yin dang sgra mi rtag ste mig gi gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa chos can gyi chos zhes smos na thal bar 'gyur ba dag 'dzin pa gsal ba yin te mig gi gzung
analyzed: de lta yin dang sgra mi rtag ste mig gi gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa chos can gyi chos zhes smos na thal bar 'gyur ba dag 'dzin pa gsal ba yin te mig gi gzung
translated: If that were so, then it would be clear that the reductio is apprehending the subject when one says, for example, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because of being an object of auditory perception, like a pot.‚Äù

original: bya nyid ni sgrub par byed pa'i chos can gyi chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya nyid ni sgrub par byed pa'i chos can gyi chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because being an object of auditory perception is a property of the subject of the proof.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni gzhi tha dad pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i chos can la brten pa gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni gzhi tha dad pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i chos can la brten pa gsal ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù indicates that it is clear that the basis is not both different and non-different from the subject.

original: pha rol po nye bar mi gdags pa gzhung 'jug pa na ji skad brjod pa'i thal bar med par ston pa ni gal te chos zhes brjod pas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol po nye bar mi gdags pa gzhung 'jug pa na ji skad brjod pa'i thal bar med par ston pa ni gal te chos zhes brjod pas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúeven if one says ‚Äòproperty‚Äô ‚Äù shows that when one engages in the textual tradition of the opponent, there is no need to state the absurd consequence as it was stated above.

original: chos can yang yin la gzhi yang yin pa de ni chos zhes brjod pas kyang 'grub bo //
analyzed: chos can yang yin la gzhi yang yin pa de ni chos zhes brjod pas kyang 'grub bo //
translated: The subject is also the basis, and that is established even if one says ‚Äúproperty.‚Äù

original: chos can gyi sgra ni chos can tsam brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can gyi sgra ni chos can tsam brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù expresses the subject alone.

original: des ni chos can zhes bya bas chos can dang 'brel pa'i chos tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: des ni chos can zhes bya bas chos can dang 'brel pa'i chos tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, by the word ‚Äúsubject,‚Äù only a property that is related to a subject is expressed.

original: khyad par lhag pa ni ma yin la de ni chos kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub po //
analyzed: khyad par lhag pa ni ma yin la de ni chos kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub po //
translated: But the specific property is not expressed, and that is established by the intrinsic reality of the property.

original: des na chos zhes brjod pas 'di'i rten chos can rtogs par 'gyur te de la brten pa ma yin na /
analyzed: des na chos zhes brjod pas 'di'i rten chos can rtogs par 'gyur te de la brten pa ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, by the expression ‚Äúproperty,‚Äù the basis of that property, the subject, is understood, because if it were not the basis of that property,

original: chos can nyid du mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can nyid du mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it would not be a subject.

original: des na spyi tsam brjod pa chos can gyi sgra dgos pa bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na spyi tsam brjod pa chos can gyi sgra dgos pa bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is meaningful, since it expresses a mere general class.

original: khyad par brjod par 'dod na ni chos can smos pa don dang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad par brjod par 'dod na ni chos can smos pa don dang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: But if one wishes to express a specific property, then the mention of the subject is meaningful,

original: khyad par can gyi chos can la brten pa'i chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin nyid las mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi chos can la brten pa'i chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin nyid las mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a property that is the basis of a specific property is not established by the intrinsic reality of the property.

original: de'i phyir chos can zhes smos pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yin par 'grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can zhes smos pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yin par 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, by the force of the expression ‚Äúsubject,‚Äù the subject of the probandum is established.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos can khyad par can nyid kyi dbang du byas nas 'dir chos can sgra sbyar ba 'thad kyi chos tsam la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i @8b tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos can khyad par can nyid kyi dbang du byas nas 'dir chos can sgra sbyar ba 'thad kyi chos tsam la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i @8b tha tshig go //
translated: The term ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is used here in the sense of a specific property-possessor, and it is proper to apply it to a subject, but not to a mere property.

original: khyad par can gyi chos can yang chos can nyid yin pas spyi'i tshig gis kyang brjod par nus pa yin la sbyar ba la mi ltos kyang sbyar bas ni khyad par brjod par 'dod pa yin te don med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi chos can yang chos can nyid yin pas spyi'i tshig gis kyang brjod par nus pa yin la sbyar ba la mi ltos kyang sbyar bas ni khyad par brjod par 'dod pa yin te don med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since a specific property-possessor is also a property-possessor, it can be expressed by a general term. Even without depending on application, application is intended to express a distinction, because it is not meaningless.

original: de la yang ji sgrub par byed pa dang gnyi ga ma yin pa'i chos can yin par thal bar mi 'gyur ba de ston pa ni nye ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la yang ji sgrub par byed pa dang gnyi ga ma yin pa'i chos can yin par thal bar mi 'gyur ba de ston pa ni nye ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: In that case, it is shown that it is not a property-possessor that is established, nor one that is neither, because it is close.

original: khyad par la brten par grub pa na khyad par nges par 'dzin pa ni sgra las mi 'grub pa'i phyir rgyu mtshan gzhan las yongs su gzung bar grub pa spang ba la chad ma med do //
analyzed: khyad par la brten par grub pa na khyad par nges par 'dzin pa ni sgra las mi 'grub pa'i phyir rgyu mtshan gzhan las yongs su gzung bar grub pa spang ba la chad ma med do //
translated: When it is established as based on a distinction, there is no interruption in abandoning the establishment of the object-universal from a different reason, because the ascertainment of the distinction is not established from the word.

original: des na 'dir chos can gyi tshig gis ni bsgrub bya'i chos rtogs pa'i don du gzung ba'i chos can nyid smos par 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir chos can gyi tshig gis ni bsgrub bya'i chos rtogs pa'i don du gzung ba'i chos can nyid smos par 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, here it is reasonable to state the subject that is the object of apprehension for the purpose of understanding the predicate to be proven.

original: des na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos nyid du grub pa na nye bar btags pas don med de /
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos nyid du grub pa na nye bar btags pas don med de /
translated: Therefore, when the predicate of the probandum is established as the property of the subject, the designation is pointless.

original: chos can chos zhes nye bar ma btags pa nyid du sbyar bar rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: chos can chos zhes nye bar ma btags pa nyid du sbyar bar rigs so zhe na /
translated: It is reasonable to use the subject without designating it as the property of the subject.

original: dgos pa ni dgag pa'i phyir smos pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgos pa ni dgag pa'i phyir smos pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The purpose is not to state the subject for the sake of refuting it.

original: de ltar bsgrub bya'i chos can 'grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub bya'i chos can 'grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: In that case, the predicate of the probandum is not established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why is that? Because it is not shared.

original: de smras pa ni dpe'i chos can yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de smras pa ni dpe'i chos can yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is stated as ‚ÄúThe example subject also.‚Äù

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan las grub pa 'dzin pas na nye bar gyur pa nyid chos can gyi tshigs gis smos pas gnyi ga ma yin pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos can gsal bar grub du chug mod bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi chos can smos pa la ni khyad parüîΩdu byed pa'i rgyu yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan las grub pa 'dzin pas na nye bar gyur pa nyid chos can gyi tshigs gis smos pas gnyi ga ma yin pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos can gsal bar grub du chug mod bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi chos can smos pa la ni khyad par du byed pa'i rgyu yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Since it is the basis for the establishment of the reason, it is called the ‚Äúsubject.‚ÄùüîΩThe subject is clearly established as having a nature that is neither of those two.üîΩHowever, there is no reason to distinguish between the subject that is the predicate of the probandum and the subject that is the reason.

original: dpe'i chos can yang sgrub byed kyis 'dzin par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can yang sgrub byed kyis 'dzin par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no difference between the subject that is the predicate of the probandum and the subject that is the reason in terms of their being the basis for the establishment of the reason.

original: 'dir de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya bas zhes smras te /
analyzed: 'dir de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya bas zhes smras te /
translated: Here, it is said, ‚ÄúBy ‚Äòpervasion by that property,‚Äô ‚ÄùüîΩand so forth.

original: chos can zhes smos pa na gzung ba'i chos can la 'jug par nges par bya ba yin pas de la yod pa nyid du bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: chos can zhes smos pa na gzung ba'i chos can la 'jug par nges par bya ba yin pas de la yod pa nyid du bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: When the term ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is mentioned, it is ascertained to refer to the subject that is apprehended. Therefore, it must be shown to exist in that.

original: dpe'i chos can la ni chos yod par grub pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dpe'i chos can la ni chos yod par grub pa nyid yin te /
translated: The subject that is the example is already established as having the property.

original: 'di ltar de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ldog brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ldog brjod pa yin la /
translated: This is because ‚Äúpervasion by that property‚Äù is the statement of positive and negative concomitance.

original: de nyid kyang gcig gi sgo nas dpes bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyang gcig gi sgo nas dpes bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: That is also to be taught by way of an example, in one way.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa'i chos de la yod pa ni grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa'i chos de la yod pa ni grub pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the property of the probandum that exists in that is just the established.

original: de'i phyir de ni nye ba yin yang chos can gyi tshig gis smos pa don med pas ngag la don yod par bstan ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de nyid 'dir smos pa yin no zhe na /üîΩ'di dgag pa'i phyir grub bzhin @9a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni nye ba yin yang chos can gyi tshig gis smos pa don med pas ngag la don yod par bstan ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de nyid 'dir smos pa yin no zhe na / 'di dgag pa'i phyir grub bzhin @9a * //
translated: Therefore, although it is close, since the statement by the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is pointless, the statement of the purpose of the statement is the subject of the probandum itself.

original: du zhes smos so //
analyzed: du zhes smos so //
translated: In order to refute that, ‚Äújust as it is established‚Äù is stated.

original: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya bas gtan tshigs dpe'i chos can la yod par grub bzhin du yang yod par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya bas gtan tshigs dpe'i chos can la yod par grub bzhin du yang yod par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it is pervaded by that part, although the reason is established as existing in the example subject, it is taught as existing.

original: de nyid kyi chos gang yin pa de kho na gtan tshigs yin no zhes brnan pa'i phyir yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi chos gang yin pa de kho na gtan tshigs yin no zhes brnan pa'i phyir yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Since it is just that which is the property of that, it is just that which is the reason.

original: de lta na yang yang bsgrub pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang yang bsgrub pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, since the repeated establishment has a result, it is not pointless.

original: gal te bsgrub pa 'bras bu med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir brnan par dogs pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub pa 'bras bu med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir brnan par dogs pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that there is no need for repetition because the proof is not fruitless?

original: 'di ltar de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya bas ni de dpe'i chos can gyi chos kyis khyab par brjod pa yin la dpe'i chos can gyi chos gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba 'dis ni gtan tshigs nyid du yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya bas ni de dpe'i chos can gyi chos kyis khyab par brjod pa yin la dpe'i chos can gyi chos gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba 'dis ni gtan tshigs nyid du yin te /
translated: In this way, ‚Äúpervasion by the property of the example‚Äù expresses the pervasion of the subject of the example by the property of the example. ‚ÄúThe property of the subject of the example is the reason‚Äù expresses the reason.

original: de na dpe'i chos can gyi chos dpe'i chos can gyi chos kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'di la sgrub pa don med pa ma yin pa'i phyir brnan pa'i phyir yin par dogs par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de na dpe'i chos can gyi chos dpe'i chos can gyi chos kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'di la sgrub pa don med pa ma yin pa'i phyir brnan pa'i phyir yin par dogs par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since the property of the subject of the example is pervaded by the property of the subject of the example, there is no need for repetition because the proof is not fruitless.

original: bden te khas blangs nas nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: bden te khas blangs nas nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: This is true, but it is stated by way of an assumption.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yul la brnan pa khas len pa yod do zhes ston pa ni mthun pa kho na la zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yul la brnan pa khas len pa yod do zhes ston pa ni mthun pa kho na la zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúonly in the case of agreement‚Äù shows that there is repetition in the case of an object of this kind.

original: mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba 'dis mthun pa'i phyogs la nges par yod pa nyid du bstan pas mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa las ldog pa grub mod kyi de med pa la med pa zhes mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ston parüîΩbyed pa gang yin pa 'dis ni /
analyzed: mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba 'dis mthun pa'i phyogs la nges par yod pa nyid du bstan pas mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa las ldog pa grub mod kyi de med pa la med pa zhes mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'dis ni /
translated: this shows the exclusion of the dissimilar instances.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la med pa smos pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la med pa smos pa de bzhin no //
translated: This is just like the statement, ‚Äúwhere there is no object to be established, there is no reason.‚Äù

original: de ni 'chad pa po dag gis nges pa'i phyir yin par bshad do //
analyzed: de ni 'chad pa po dag gis nges pa'i phyir yin par bshad do //
translated: This is explained by the commentators as being certain.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa gsum po de las gzhan pa dang de dang 'gal ba dang de med pa'i rang bzhin las de med pa la med pa nyid yin gyi gzhan la med pa la ni ma yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa gsum po de las gzhan pa dang de dang 'gal ba dang de med pa'i rang bzhin las de med pa la med pa nyid yin gyi gzhan la med pa la ni ma yin no zhe'o //
translated: The absence of the reason in the absence of the object to be established is only in the three kinds of dissimilar instances, not in other dissimilar instances, nor in those that are contradictory to them, nor in those that are essentially absent.

original: des na de ltar bsgrub bya sgrub byed ma yin pa ni rang bzhin gyi chos can bsal kyang dpe'i chos can yin par yongs su 'dzin pa ni gsal bar mi nus pas chos can zhes smos pas bsgrub bya'i chos can mi rtogs pa'i phyir nye bar gdags par
analyzed: des na de ltar bsgrub bya sgrub byed ma yin pa ni rang bzhin gyi chos can bsal kyang dpe'i chos can yin par yongs su 'dzin pa ni gsal bar mi nus pas chos can zhes smos pas bsgrub bya'i chos can mi rtogs pa'i phyir nye bar gdags par
translated: Therefore, the probandum and the proof are not like that. Even though the property of the subject is eliminated, the example is still held to be the property of the subject. Since it is not possible to clarify that, the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is stated.

original: bya ba nyid pas phyogs zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba nyid pas phyogs zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: Since the property of the probandum is not understood, the word ‚Äúposition‚Äù is stated because it is to be designated.

original: gal te spyi tsam brjod pa'i chos can gyi tshig sbyar ba don med pa'i phyir khyad par brjod par 'dod par grub pa ni dpe'i chos can nyid ni khyad par yin par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te spyi tsam brjod pa'i chos can gyi tshig sbyar ba don med pa'i phyir khyad par brjod par 'dod par grub pa ni dpe'i chos can nyid ni khyad par yin par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is applied to express a mere generality, then since it would be meaningless, it is established that it is asserted to express a particular. Is it not the case that the example is the property of the subject and is not a particular?

original: de la yod pa ni gzhan du rtogs pa'i yan lag tu nye bar bstan @9b pa yin te de'i chas khyab pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yod pa ni gzhan du rtogs pa'i yan lag tu nye bar bstan @9b pa yin te de'i chas khyab pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is taught as a part of the understanding of existence elsewhere, because it is pervaded by that part, it becomes the reason.

original: dpe'i chos can la ni yongs su zin kyang gtan tshigs nyid ma yin te dper ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid shes par byed pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can la ni yongs su zin kyang gtan tshigs nyid ma yin te dper ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid shes par byed pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the case of the example, even though it is completely similar, it is not the reason itself, because there is no property of the subject that is understood by the example, which is the nature of the understanding of what is not understood.

original: des na de'i chas khyab pa'i gtan tshigs gang la yod pas gtan tshigs kyi dngos po nyid du 'gyur ba de'i chas khyab pa nyid kyis nges bar byed pa'i dngos po'i yan lag tu gyur pas rtogs par bya ba'i chos nyid kyi chos can shes par byed pa'iüîΩrten du gyur pa 'ga' zhig 'phangs pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na de'i chas khyab pa'i gtan tshigs gang la yod pas gtan tshigs kyi dngos po nyid du 'gyur ba de'i chas khyab pa nyid kyis nges bar byed pa'i dngos po'i yan lag tu gyur pas rtogs par bya ba'i chos nyid kyi chos can shes par byed pa'i rten du gyur pa 'ga' zhig 'phangs pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the reason is the property of the subject that is to be understood, which is the part of the entity that is ascertained by the pervasion by that part, and which is the basis for the expression of the entity of the reason, because it is the part of the entity that is ascertained by the pervasion by that part, by which the reason exists.

original: des na chos can gyi gtan tshigs zhes bya bas ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i yan lag de'i chas khyab pa la ltos pa chos can de la yod pa na gtan tshigs kyi dngos por brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na chos can gyi gtan tshigs zhes bya bas ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i yan lag de'i chas khyab pa la ltos pa chos can de la yod pa na gtan tshigs kyi dngos por brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the reason is the property of the subject. By that, the part that is the basis for the understanding of what is not understood is the pervasion by that part. When it exists in the subject, it is called the entity of the reason.

original: gzhi tha dad pa la yang thal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhi tha dad pa la yang thal ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that there is an absurd consequence even when there is a difference in the basis.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i chos nyid kyis chos can 'phangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i chos nyid kyis chos can 'phangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the fact of the subject is implied by the reality to be realized.

original: dogs pa 'di la brjod pa ni shugs kyis zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dogs pa 'di la brjod pa ni shugs kyis zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúindirectly‚Äù is used to express this doubt.

original: 'bad pas thob par bya ba'i don nges pa'i tshig sbyar ba ni smra ba la bzo ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bad pas thob par bya ba'i don nges pa'i tshig sbyar ba ni smra ba la bzo ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not a fault of expression to use a compound word in order to ascertain the meaning to be obtained by effort.

original: des na ji skad brjod pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi don go na rtogs bar dka' bar 'gyur te rigs pas go ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na ji skad brjod pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi don go na rtogs bar dka' bar 'gyur te rigs pas go ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, if the meaning of the subject to be established is understood by the force of the words as they are spoken, it becomes difficult to understand, because it is understood by reasoning.

original: don gyi rjes su 'brang bas byas ba'i dka' ba spangs nas sgras rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos yin no //
analyzed: don gyi rjes su 'brang bas byas ba'i dka' ba spangs nas sgras rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos yin no //
translated: Having abandoned the difficulty created by following the meaning, the treatise is for the purpose of understanding through words.

original: des na rtogs par dka' ba yongs su spangs pa'i phyir yang phyogs zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rtogs par dka' ba yongs su spangs pa'i phyir yang phyogs zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúposition‚Äù is also used in order to completely abandon what is difficult to understand.

original: gal te phyogs bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos nyid yin na /
translated: If the position is the reality of the subject to be established,

original: chos can gzhan la med pa'i chos thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: chos can gzhan la med pa'i chos thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin no //
translated: it is the uncommon property that does not exist in other subjects.

original: gtan tshigs smras ba ni de'i khyad par la ltos pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs smras ba ni de'i khyad par la ltos pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The reason is called ‚Äúdependent on its particularity.‚Äù

original: gang gi tshe chos 'di phyogs kyi yin pa de'i tshe de med par mi srid pas gzhan la yang 'di yod pas chos can de dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos 'di phyogs kyi yin pa de'i tshe de med par mi srid pas gzhan la yang 'di yod pas chos can de dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When this property belongs to a subject, then since it is impossible for it not to exist, it also exists in another subject, and so it becomes a property of that subject.

original: chos can gzhan gyis rnam par bcad pa de ni chos can gzhan la 'jug par mi srid pas na thun mong ma yin ba nyid do //
analyzed: chos can gzhan gyis rnam par bcad pa de ni chos can gzhan la 'jug par mi srid pas na thun mong ma yin ba nyid do //
translated: Since it is impossible for the exclusion of one subject to apply to another subject, it is not shared.

original: ci ste gang gi rnam pa de lta bu nyid gzhan la yod par dogs pa phyogs kyis rnam par bcad pa des rnam par bcad pa mi 'dor ro zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: ci ste gang gi rnam pa de lta bu nyid gzhan la yod par dogs pa phyogs kyis rnam par bcad pa des rnam par bcad pa mi 'dor ro zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci yod ce na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the logic in this statement, ‚ÄòIf there is a doubt that another subject has the same aspect as this one, then the exclusion by the subject is not relinquished‚Äô?‚Äù

original: chos nyid kyis chos can dang 'brel pa 'phangs pa'i chos nyid ni nges pa med par bsgrub bya'i chos @10a * //üîΩcan gyi yin pa'am /
analyzed: chos nyid kyis chos can dang 'brel pa 'phangs pa'i chos nyid ni nges pa med par bsgrub bya'i chos @10a * // can gyi yin pa'am /
translated: The property that is implied by the connection of the property of reality with the subject is not ascertained as the property of the subject that is to be proven,

original: sgrub byed kyi chos can gyi yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi chos can gyi yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: or as the property of the subject that proves it.

original: de gang gi tshe sgrub byed kyi chos can gyi chos yin pa de'i tshe bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi ma yin te /
analyzed: de gang gi tshe sgrub byed kyi chos can gyi chos yin pa de'i tshe bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi ma yin te /
translated: When it is a quality of the subject of the probandum, it is not a quality of the subject of the probandum.

original: des na mi 'gyur ba de nyid sel bas sgra 'di don dang bcas par 'gyur bas de la yod pa chos can gzhan la med pa'i phyir nges pa grub pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid do snyam na /
analyzed: des na mi 'gyur ba de nyid sel bas sgra 'di don dang bcas par 'gyur bas de la yod pa chos can gzhan la med pa'i phyir nges pa grub pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid do snyam na /
translated: Therefore, since that unchanging is eliminated, this word would have a referent. Since it exists in one and does not exist in another, it is established as definite, and therefore it is not shared.

original: dogs pa 'di slob dpon gzhan du nges pa srid pa ston pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dogs pa 'di slob dpon gzhan du nges pa srid pa ston pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This doubt is not taught elsewhere by the master.

original: nges pa rtogs kyang 'di ltar 'dir mi 'thad do //
analyzed: nges pa rtogs kyang 'di ltar 'dir mi 'thad do //
translated: Even if one understands definite, it is not tenable in this way.

original: gal te sgrub byed kyi chos can la yod pa dang bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod pa 'gal na de'i tshe chos can gzhan la yod na bsgrub bya'i chos can la med par 'gyur ba'i phyir med pa de nyid la ltos nas sgra sbyar ba ni chos can
analyzed: gal te sgrub byed kyi chos can la yod pa dang bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod pa 'gal na de'i tshe chos can gzhan la yod na bsgrub bya'i chos can la med par 'gyur ba'i phyir med pa de nyid la ltos nas sgra sbyar ba ni chos can
translated: If it is contradictory for something to exist in the subject of the probandum and to exist in the subject of the proof, then at that time, if it exists in another subject, it would not exist in the subject of the probandum. Therefore, in dependence on that nonexistence, the word is applied to the subject of the probandum.

original: gzhan la yod pa 'gal bas de la yod par brjod pa de nyid la yod pa zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na gang gi tshe chos thun mong gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos can mang po dag la gcig par yang yod par srid pa
analyzed: gzhan la yod pa 'gal bas de la yod par brjod pa de nyid la yod pa zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na gang gi tshe chos thun mong gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos can mang po dag la gcig par yang yod par srid pa
translated: But when it is the nature of a phenomenon that is shared, it is possible for it to exist in many subjects as one.

original: de'i tshe gang zhig sgras brjod par bya ba chos nyid kyis ma 'phangs pa'i chos can la yod pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe gang zhig sgras brjod par bya ba chos nyid kyis ma 'phangs pa'i chos can la yod pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: At that time, that which is not indicated by the term as the property of the subject that exists by way of its own nature does not exist.

original: chos ni chos can thams cad la yod par 'gyur ba'i nges pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos ni chos can thams cad la yod par 'gyur ba'i nges pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because there is no certainty that the phenomenon exists in all subjects.

original: mig gis gzung bya nyid ni dpe nyid la yod pa'i phyir dang mnyan bya nyid ni bsgrub bya nyid la yod pa'i phyir dang / chos nyid kyis chos dang chos can 'brel pas ma bsal ba 'dod rgyal ba'i med pa la ltos nas sgra'i sbyor ba 'jug pa ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid kyis mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin gyi /üîΩgzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gis gzung bya nyid ni dpe nyid la yod pa'i phyir dang mnyan bya nyid ni bsgrub bya nyid la yod pa'i phyir dang / chos nyid kyis chos dang chos can 'brel pas ma bsal ba 'dod rgyal ba'i med pa la ltos nas sgra'i sbyor ba 'jug pa ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid kyis mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin gyi / gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because the object of the eye exists in the example itself, because the object of hearing exists in the probandum itself, and because the relation of the property possessor to the property is not eliminated by the property itself, the application of the term is restricted by the exclusion of the non-existent that is desired, and it is not restricted by the exclusion of the possessor of another.

original: der 'dod rgyal ba'i med pa bsal ba ni chos can gzhan la yang yod pa mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der 'dod rgyal ba'i med pa bsal ba ni chos can gzhan la yang yod pa mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the elimination of the non-existent that is desired is not contradictory in other property possessors,

original: yod pa la ni med pa 'gal ba'i phyir de rtogs pa na ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pa nyid yin no zhes bshad pa ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod bas khyad par du byas pa'i phyir yin gyi zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yod pa la ni med pa 'gal ba'i phyir de rtogs pa na ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pa nyid yin no zhes bshad pa ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod bas khyad par du byas pa'i phyir yin gyi zhes bya ste /
translated: it is said that when that is understood, it is restricted by the exclusion of the non-possessor, because it is distinguished by the exclusion of the non-possessor.

original: 'dod rgyal ba'i med pa bzlog pas phyogs kyi chos kho na yin kyi chos ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes chos phyogs dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas 'brel par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod rgyal ba'i med pa bzlog pas phyogs kyi chos kho na yin kyi chos ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes chos phyogs dang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas 'brel par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the absence of desire is refuted, it is only the property of the subject, not the non-property. Thus, by excluding the absence of connection with the property, it is connected.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'am gzhan dang de ldan pa rnam par bcad pa @10b yang ji lta bur gyur pa dag cig ce na /
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'am gzhan dang de ldan pa rnam par bcad pa @10b yang ji lta bur gyur pa dag cig ce na /
translated: What are the exclusions of non-possession and possession of something else?

original: 'jig rten pa'i dpes ston pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dpes ston pa ni /
translated: The teacher uses an example from the world:

original: dper na nag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na nag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: For example, black and so on.

original: phyogs chos zhes bya ba rnam par bkral nas /
analyzed: phyogs chos zhes bya ba rnam par bkral nas /
translated: Having explained property of the subject,

original: de chas khyab pa ni zhes bya ba rnam par 'brel pa ni de'i cha ni de'i chos yin gyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de chas khyab pa ni zhes bya ba rnam par 'brel pa ni de'i cha ni de'i chos yin gyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: pervasion by that part is the connection. That part means that property.

original: nye bar btags pa'i phyir na cha'i sgra 'di na chos kyi don yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i phyir na cha'i sgra 'di na chos kyi don yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since it is a metaphorical expression, the word part here has the meaning of property. This is the meaning.

original: de'i phyogs gcig ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni dngos kyi don la 'jug pa nyid 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni dngos kyi don la 'jug pa nyid 'gog pa'o //
translated: Not just one part refutes the engagement in the actual meaning.

original: don de la gnod pa brjod pa ni phyogs zhes bya ba'i sgra spyi la spyi bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: don de la gnod pa brjod pa ni phyogs zhes bya ba'i sgra spyi la spyi bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúside‚Äù is used for the object of refutation because the word ‚Äúside‚Äù is used in the sense of a universal for a universal.

original: de zhes bya ba 'dis ni phyogs bzung ba yin la de la ni phyogs gcig srid pa ma yin te spyi'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba 'dis ni phyogs bzung ba yin la de la ni phyogs gcig srid pa ma yin te spyi'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù indicates the side, and it is not possible for it to be one side because it is not of the nature of a universal.

original: des na 'dir cha'i sgra ni phyogs gcig tu sgo btags nas chos la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir cha'i sgra ni phyogs gcig tu sgo btags nas chos la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, here the word ‚Äúpart‚Äù is used figuratively for a property in the sense of one side.

original: gang zhig nye bar gdags pa'i sbyor ba khas len pa de'i chos kyis khyab pa zhes ma brjod pa yang ci ste zhe na smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis zhes smos so //
analyzed: gang zhig nye bar gdags pa'i sbyor ba khas len pa de'i chos kyis khyab pa zhes ma brjod pa yang ci ste zhe na smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis zhes smos so //
translated: Why is it not said that the property pervades the subject when one accepts the application of the term ‚Äúpervasion‚Äù? Because it is said ‚Äúby the power of the speaker‚Äôs intention.‚Äù

original: 'dir smra ba bo'i bsam pa ni yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir smra ba bo'i bsam pa ni yod pa yin no //
translated: The speaker‚Äôs intention is present here.

original: de yang gang zhe na skabs su gyur pa nyid kyis na ma brjod pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na skabs su gyur pa nyid kyis na ma brjod pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: What is that? It is that which is not stated because it is understood in the context.

original: de lta yin dang / ji ltar 'dir spyir brjod pa nyid kyis 'dod pa rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos can gyi tshig sbyor ba bkag pa de bzhin du chos kyi tshig kyang yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang / ji ltar 'dir spyir brjod pa nyid kyis 'dod pa rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos can gyi tshig sbyor ba bkag pa de bzhin du chos kyi tshig kyang yin no //
translated: If that were so, then just as the words that state the subject are prohibited because they are not understood by the general statement here, so too the words that state the property are also like that.

original: bsgrub par bya ba bzhin du bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i chos kyang chos nyid yin pa'i phyir des khyab pa yang gtan tshigs su rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bzhin du bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i chos kyang chos nyid yin pa'i phyir des khyab pa yang gtan tshigs su rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Because the property of the subject is a property that is not to be proven, like the probandum, its pervasion would also be understood as the reason.

original: dper na 'di ni shing yin te byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'di ni shing yin te byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it would be like saying, ‚ÄúThis is a tree because it is produced.‚Äù

original: shing bsgrub par bya ba la byas pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma yin pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: shing bsgrub par bya ba la byas pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma yin pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang khyab pa yin la /
translated: In the proof of a tree, being produced is the property of the subject. Impermanence, which is the property of the subject that is not to be proven, is also the pervasion.

original: brjod par 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos yin pas na bsam pa de'i dbang gis phyogs gcig tu sgro btags nas chos bstan pa yin gyi rang gi sgras ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos yin pas na bsam pa de'i dbang gis phyogs gcig tu sgro btags nas chos bstan pa yin gyi rang gi sgras ni ma yin no //
translated: Since what is desired is the property to be proven, the property is stated by superimposing it on one part by the power of that thought, but not by its own words.

original: de ltar bsgrub bya'i chos rtogs par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub bya'i chos rtogs par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does one understand the property to be proven in that way?

original: 'di skad brjod de /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod de /
translated: This is stated:

original: 'dir spyir gang zhig sgro btags nas chos can bstan pa de'i phyogs gcig sgro btags pas chos bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir spyir gang zhig sgro btags nas chos can bstan pa de'i phyogs gcig sgro btags pas chos bstan pa yin te /
translated: In general, here, the property possessor is indicated through superimposition. One part of that is indicated through superimposition as the property.

original: phyogs gcig gzhan mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs gcig gzhan mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one part is not understood as another.

original: phyogs kyi phyogs gcig pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos sam bsgrub bya'i @11a * //üîΩchos can yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi phyogs gcig pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos sam bsgrub bya'i @11a * // chos can yin te /
translated: One part of a part is the property to be proven or the property possessor to be proven.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos phyogs kyi phyogs gcig gis khyab pa yin no zhes brjod pa na bsgrub bya'i chos kyis khyab pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos phyogs kyi phyogs gcig gis khyab pa yin no zhes brjod pa na bsgrub bya'i chos kyis khyab pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when it is said that the property of the property possessor is pervaded by one part of a part, the pervasion by the property to be proven is understood.

original: chos can yang de'i phyogs gcig ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: chos can yang de'i phyogs gcig ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the property possessor also one part of that?

original: bden mod kyi /
analyzed: bden mod kyi /
translated: That is true, but

original: des khyab pa ni mi srid de /
analyzed: des khyab pa ni mi srid de /
translated: pervasion by that is impossible.

original: de ni khyad par gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni khyad par gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is the nature of a distinction.

original: gal te khyad par la khyab pa mi rtogs pa yin gyi med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par la khyab pa mi rtogs pa yin gyi med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that pervasion is not understood in a distinction but is not nonexistent,

original: ma yin te khyab ba ni rjes su 'gro ldog gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / de dag kyang thams cad na yod pa'i rang bzhin pa'i phyir dang / de yang khyad par mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te khyab ba ni rjes su 'gro ldog gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / de dag kyang thams cad na yod pa'i rang bzhin pa'i phyir dang / de yang khyad par mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because pervasion is the nature of positive and negative concomitance, and those exist in all cases, and that is impossible for a distinction.

original: des na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos bsgrub bya'i chos kyis khyab pa ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos bsgrub bya'i chos kyis khyab pa ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúThe reason is the property of the subject that is pervaded by the property to be proven‚Äù is understood.

original: phyogs chos de'i chas zhes bya ba bshad nas /
analyzed: phyogs chos de'i chas zhes bya ba bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the property of the subject and the part of it,

original: khyab pa bshad pa'i phyir khyab pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: khyab pa bshad pa'i phyir khyab pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: in order to explain the pervasion, he says ‚Äúpervasion‚Äù and so on.

original: khyab par byed pas khyab par bya ba khyab pa yin pa'i phyir khyab pa yin no //üîΩde brjod pa ni de dag gis so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin khyad par can brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyab par byed pas khyab par bya ba khyab pa yin pa'i phyir khyab pa yin no // de brjod pa ni de dag gis so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin khyad par can brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Pervasion is because the pervader pervades the pervaded.üîΩThe expression of that is by those, which is to say, the expression of the specific nature of their individual determination.

original: des na khyab par byed pa'i khyad par ji lta bu yin pa de nyid de ltar brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: des na khyab par byed pa'i khyad par ji lta bu yin pa de nyid de ltar brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the expression is just like the specific pervader.

original: bya ba zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no such thing as an action.

original: 'dir tshig gsum la nges par gzung bar bya ba ni de kho na la zhes bya ba dang / khyad par byed pa kho na la zhes bya ba dang / yod pa kho na zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum srid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir tshig gsum la nges par gzung bar bya ba ni de kho na la zhes bya ba dang / khyad par byed pa kho na la zhes bya ba dang / yod pa kho na zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum srid par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the three terms that must be ascertained are the three types: ‚Äúonly in that,‚Äù ‚Äúonly in the qualifier,‚Äù and ‚Äúonly in the existent.‚Äù

original: de la khyab par byed pa go bar bya ba la khyad par bya ba go bar byed pa nyid du 'thad pas na /
analyzed: de la khyab par byed pa go bar bya ba la khyad par bya ba go bar byed pa nyid du 'thad pas na /
translated: Since it is tenable that the qualifier is understood in the predicate,

original: de'i chas khyab pa gtan tshigs yin na zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa gtan tshigs yin na zhes bstan to //
translated: it is taught that the reason is pervasion by a portion of it.

original: khyad par byed pa nyid la khyab par bya ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yod pa'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid du yang /
analyzed: khyad par byed pa nyid la khyab par bya ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yod pa'i phyir dang / gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid du yang /
translated: Since the predicate is pervasion in the qualifier, there is forward and reverse pervasion, and since those two are the proof,

original: de dag nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag nyid sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: it is taught that the reason is the means of understanding.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa yod na bsgrub bya yod par so sor nges pas na gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin no zhes go bar byed pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa na /
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa yod na bsgrub bya yod par so sor nges pas na gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin no zhes go bar byed pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa na /
translated: Therefore, since the existence of the probandum is ascertained individually when the proof exists, the reason is what causes understanding.

original: de la khyab par byed pa yod pa kho na zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //üîΩde la khyab par byed pa kho na yod pa zhes nges par bzung na ni go bar byed pa'i chos bstan par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la khyab par byed pa yod pa kho na zhes brjod par bya ba yin no // de la khyab par byed pa kho na yod pa zhes nges par bzung na ni go bar byed pa'i chos bstan par mi 'gyur te /
translated: When the nature of what causes understanding is stated, then it must be said that the pervasion exists.üîΩIf it is ascertained that the pervasion exists, then the property of the subject is not stated.

original: khyab par bya ba nye bar gnas @11b pa la khyab par byed pa ma yin pa yod kyang de yod pa la so sor nges par gyur pa'i khyad par byed pa'i rtogs pa mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba nye bar gnas @11b pa la khyab par byed pa ma yin pa yod kyang de yod pa la so sor nges par gyur pa'i khyad par byed pa'i rtogs pa mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because even though the pervader does not exist when the pervaded exists, it is not contradictory for the realization of the distinction of the ascertainment of the existence of the pervaded to occur.

original: de bzhin du de kho na la khyab par byed pa yod pa zhes gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yang yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de kho na la khyab par byed pa yod pa zhes gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yang yan lag ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, it is not a part of the statement that the pervasion exists in that alone, because it excludes the existence of something else.

original: ji ltar brjod pa'i tshul nyid gtan tshigs su grub pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: ji ltar brjod pa'i tshul nyid gtan tshigs su grub pa'i phyir na /
translated: This is because the method of expression itself is established as the reason.

original: gtan tshigs las gzhan la med pas sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs las gzhan la med pas sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not a proof, since it is not a reason.

original: gang gi tshe de khyab bya med par yang yod pa de'i tshe mi rtogs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de khyab bya med par yang yod pa de'i tshe mi rtogs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And when it exists even in the absence of the pervaded, then it is called ‚Äúnon-comprehending.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon ni de las rtogs pas na de med pa'i phyir bsgrub bya la 'khrul pa ma yin pas gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad pa ni don med do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon ni de las rtogs pas na de med pa'i phyir bsgrub bya la 'khrul pa ma yin pas gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad pa ni don med do //
translated: Since the fault of the reason is that it is understood from that, and since that does not exist, it is not mistaken with regard to the probandum. Therefore, the exclusion of the other is meaningless.

original: khyab par byed pa gzhan dang ldan pa can nyid yin yang go bar byed pa'i dngos por rigs pa'i go bar byed pa de'i dngos po yin pa yang bkag pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang yin no //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa gzhan dang ldan pa can nyid yin yang go bar byed pa'i dngos por rigs pa'i go bar byed pa de'i dngos po yin pa yang bkag pa'i phyir 'gal ba yang yin no //
translated: Even though the pervader is possessed of another, the thing that is the cause of understanding is the thing that is the cause of understanding that is reasonable. Since that is also negated, it is contradictory.

original: khyad par bya ba med par yang 'gyur la /
analyzed: khyad par bya ba med par yang 'gyur la /
translated: It would also be without a specific object.

original: khyab par bya ba la yang so sor nges pa'i phyir de las rtogs pa mi 'gal ba'i phyir te rtsol ba las byung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba la yang so sor nges pa'i phyir de las rtogs pa mi 'gal ba'i phyir te rtsol ba las byung ba nyid yin no //
translated: And since it is individually ascertained with regard to the pervaded, it is not contradictory that it is understood from that. It arises from effort.

original: mi rtag pa nyid rtsol ba las byung ba nyid med par 'gyur yang rtsol ba las byung ba la nges par yod pa'i phyir de las mi rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid rtsol ba las byung ba nyid med par 'gyur yang rtsol ba las byung ba la nges par yod pa'i phyir de las mi rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Impermanence would not arise from exertion, but since it definitely exists in what arises from exertion, how could it not be understood from that?

original: des na mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid 'thad pa yin te brjod bya ji lta bar rjod par byed pa sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid 'thad pa yin te brjod bya ji lta bar rjod par byed pa sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the exclusion of non-possession is tenable, because the expression is applied in accordance with the expressed meaning.

original: khyab par bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i khyab pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ston pa 'di yang na de kho na la zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i khyab pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ston pa 'di yang na de kho na la zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The characteristic of pervasion that is the nature of the pervaded is also shown here. This is only in that.

original: de kho na la khyab par bya ba yod pa ni khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: de kho na la khyab par bya ba yod pa ni khyab pa yin no //
translated: Pervasion is the existence of the pervaded only in that.

original: 'dir yang snga ma bzhin nges par bzung ba rnam pa gsum srid pa las gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang snga ma bzhin nges par bzung ba rnam pa gsum srid pa las gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid 'dod pa yin te /
translated: Here also, as before, the exclusion of possession by others is asserted from the three possible ways of ascertaining.

original: de khyab par byed pa spangs nas gzhan na yod na de las rtogs pa mi brten pas rjes su dpog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / de kho na la yod na ni bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de khyab par byed pa spangs nas gzhan na yod na de las rtogs pa mi brten pas rjes su dpog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / de kho na la yod na ni bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it exists only there, then it is reversed.

original: gzhan bzhin du der yang yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan bzhin du der yang yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it exists there like elsewhere,

original: yod mod / de nyid kyi phyir de yod pa na de dang de ma yin pa dag yod par the tshom za bar thal lo //
analyzed: yod mod / de nyid kyi phyir de yod pa na de dang de ma yin pa dag yod par the tshom za bar thal lo //
translated: then it exists there, but because of that, it follows that there is doubt that it exists there and does not exist there.

original: khyab par byed pa gnyi ga la yod pas kyang ji ltar the tshom mi za zhe na /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa gnyi ga la yod pas kyang ji ltar the tshom mi za zhe na /
translated: If it exists in both the pervader and the pervaded, then how can there be no doubt?

original: de yod na yod par so sor nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yod na yod par so sor nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Because it is ascertained individually that it exists when it exists, it has been explained.

original: @12a * // gzhan du med pas go bar byed pa nyid du 'thad pa'i phyir khyab par bya ba ma yin pa yod pa mi 'gal bas nad la khyab bar bya ba kho na yod pa zhes bya ba ni yan lag ma yin pa dang yang rtogs par byed pa ma
analyzed: @12a * // gzhan du med pas go bar byed pa nyid du 'thad pa'i phyir khyab par bya ba ma yin pa yod pa mi 'gal bas nad la khyab bar bya ba kho na yod pa zhes bya ba ni yan lag ma yin pa dang yang rtogs par byed pa ma
translated: Because it is tenable that it is an indicator when it does not exist elsewhere, it is not contradictory that it exists without being pervaded. Therefore, it is not a part of the statement that it exists only where it pervades.

original: yin pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yin pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is also not a part of the statement that it is not an indicator.

original: khyab par byed pa yod pa la yod par nges pa de la khyab par bya ba yod pa kho na zhes bya ba yang don med pa yin te /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa yod pa la yod par nges pa de la khyab par bya ba yod pa kho na zhes bya ba yang don med pa yin te /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe existence of the pervader is ascertained as existent, and only that which exists is pervaded‚Äù is meaningless,

original: de med par mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / rtogs na 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / rtogs na 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the non-existence of that is not realized, and if it is realized, there is no error.

original: nges pas med kyang rtogs par byed pa yod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi dngos por 'thad pa yang 'gog par thal ba'i phyir te dper na rtsol ba las byung ba nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: nges pas med kyang rtogs par byed pa yod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi dngos por 'thad pa yang 'gog par thal ba'i phyir te dper na rtsol ba las byung ba nyid bzhin no //
translated: It follows that the existence of the reason is refuted because it is established by ascertainment, even though it does not exist, and because it is the cause of realization, just as effort is the cause of arising.

original: mi rtag pa la ni de las bzlog pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la ni de las bzlog pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because impermanence is the opposite of that.

original: yang ji ltar na 'dir mi ldan pa rnam par bcad na mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa gtan tshigs ma yin par thal gyi /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na 'dir mi ldan pa rnam par bcad na mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa gtan tshigs ma yin par thal gyi /
translated: Moreover, how is it that if non-possession is excluded here, it follows that the existence of one part of the similar class is not the reason?

original: khyab par byed pa yang ni ma yin /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa yang ni ma yin /
translated: It is not the pervader.

original: der ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad na 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: der ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad na 'gyur gyi /
translated: There, it would be if possession of the other were excluded.

original: 'di ni ma yin zhe na mtshungs pa nyid du 'gog pa yin pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni ma yin zhe na mtshungs pa nyid du 'gog pa yin pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If you say that this is not so, then the refutation is the same.

original: 'di gnyis mi 'thad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di gnyis mi 'thad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because these two are not untenable.

original: khyab par bya ba yod pa la khyab par byed pa ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad na de de dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba yod pa la khyab par byed pa ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad na de de dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: If the pervaded exists, then the pervader is not related, and it is not that it does not possess that.

original: de ltar na khyab par byed pa mi ldan pa rnam par bcad na thal ba ma yin gyi khyab par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na khyab par byed pa mi ldan pa rnam par bcad na thal ba ma yin gyi khyab par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, when the pervader is eliminated as not possessing, it is not the case that the pervaded is not so.

original: de'i phyir de ltar khyab par byed pa khyab par bya ba yod na yod ces bya bas ni rjes su 'gro ba bshad nas khyab par bya ba khyab par byed pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya bas ni ldog pa ste des na tshul gsum nyid gtan
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar khyab par byed pa khyab par bya ba yod na yod ces bya bas ni rjes su 'gro ba bshad nas khyab par bya ba khyab par byed pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya bas ni ldog pa ste des na tshul gsum nyid gtan
translated: Therefore, in that case, the pervader exists when the pervaded exists, and thus the forward pervasion is stated. The pervaded exists only in the presence of the pervader, and thus the counter pervasion is stated. Thus, the trimodal condition is established.

original: tshigs su 'thad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshigs su 'thad pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the reason is tenable.

original: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag brjod pa yin no //
translated: The expression ‚Äúpervasion by part‚Äù refers to the forward pervasion and the counter pervasion.

original: dper na tshad ma rnam par nges par mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa dag gis brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na tshad ma rnam par nges par mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa dag gis brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, in the Ascertainment of Valid Knowledge, it is said that the reason is the existence and non-existence in the similar and dissimilar classes.

original: 'dir de'i chas khyab pa dang phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos po la yod pa tsam gyi gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum brjod pa ni ma yin te shes pa'i tshul gsum nyid rtags kyi chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir de'i chas khyab pa dang phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos po la yod pa tsam gyi gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum brjod pa ni ma yin te shes pa'i tshul gsum nyid rtags kyi chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the three modes of the reason are not stated as merely existing in the property of the subject and the pervasion by that part, because the three modes of knowledge are the property of the reason.

original: 'dir ni mtshan nyid la shes pa smos pa ma byas pas de ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dir ni mtshan nyid la shes pa smos pa ma byas pas de ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
translated: Here, since the knowledge of the definition is not mentioned, how can it be understood?

original: 'dis ni zhes bshad pa tsam mo /üîΩ// / @12b bam po gnyis pa /
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bshad pa tsam mo / // / @12b bam po gnyis pa /
translated: This is merely explained by saying by this.

original: phyogs kyi chos dang rjes su 'gro ldog brjod pa 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ngas pa dag kyang bshad la phyogs kyi chos nges pa yang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos dang rjes su 'gro ldog brjod pa 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ngas pa dag kyang bshad la phyogs kyi chos nges pa yang bshad pa yin no //
translated: By stating the property of the subject and the positive and negative concomitance, the positive and negative pervasion are also explained, and the certainty of the property of the subject is also explained.

original: nges pa'i thabs mtshungs pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ldog dag phyogs kyi chos nyid las rnam par phye nas bstan to //
analyzed: nges pa'i thabs mtshungs pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ldog dag phyogs kyi chos nyid las rnam par phye nas bstan to //
translated: The concomitance and reverse concomitance of the method of ascertaining are distinguished from the property of the subject.

original: 'dir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag kyang bshad do zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag kyang bshad do zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin no //
translated: But this is not the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúHere, concomitance and reverse concomitance are also explained.‚Äù

original: gang du gzhan rtogs pa yang gzhan rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can du 'gyur ba der 'di ltar brjod par rigs kyi /
analyzed: gang du gzhan rtogs pa yang gzhan rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can du 'gyur ba der 'di ltar brjod par rigs kyi /
translated: It is reasonable to say this where the understanding of one thing has the effect of understanding another.

original: gang gis gang kho na brjod pa de bshad nas kyang /
analyzed: gang gis gang kho na brjod pa de bshad nas kyang /
translated: But when one explains what is stated by someone else,

original: yang 'di ltar brjod pa ni don dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang 'di ltar brjod pa ni don dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not reasonable to say this again, because it would be meaningless.

original: de'i chas khyab pa rtogs na yang de brjod pa'i don du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa rtogs na yang de brjod pa'i don du yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is for the purpose of stating the pervasion,

original: ma yin te khyab pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji ltar 'di'i rang bzhin brjod pa de ltar de dag rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te khyab pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji ltar 'di'i rang bzhin brjod pa de ltar de dag rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it is not so, because the statement of the nature of the reason is just like the statement of the pervasion, since the latter is understood from the former.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid la yang gzhan rtogs pa ci zhig yod na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid la yang gzhan rtogs pa ci zhig yod na /
translated: And what is the understanding of another in the case of the property of the subject?

original: phyogs kyi chos kyang bshad pa yin no zhes gang brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos kyang bshad pa yin no zhes gang brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the property of the subject has been stated.

original: de'i phyir nges pa smos pa ma byas par bstan kyang nges pa nyid brjod pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don 'di nyid nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa smos pa ma byas par bstan kyang nges pa nyid brjod pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don 'di nyid nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though the certainty is not mentioned, it is stated by the very statement of the reason. This is the point that is being made.

original: 'dir nges pa ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na gang la de yod pa der tshul gsum po de bsdu ba'i phyir de dag ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'dir nges pa ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na gang la de yod pa der tshul gsum po de bsdu ba'i phyir de dag ni zhes smos te /
translated: Here, one might ask, What is the certainty? The phrase those three is stated in order to include the three modes in whatever has them.

original: phyogs kyi chos dang de'i chas khyab pa de dag ni 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi gtan tshigs gsum yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos dang de'i chas khyab pa de dag ni 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi gtan tshigs gsum yin no //
translated: The property of the subject and the pervasion by part of that are the three kinds of reasons that have the character of effect, nature, and non-observation.

original: ji skad du brjod pa'i rtags gsum po dpes ston pa na 'bras bu la sogs pa gsum ni ji ltar 'di dang 'di'o zhes bshad pa ni dper na zhes bya ba nas bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: ji skad du brjod pa'i rtags gsum po dpes ston pa na 'bras bu la sogs pa gsum ni ji ltar 'di dang 'di'o zhes bshad pa ni dper na zhes bya ba nas bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: When the three reasons that have been stated are illustrated by examples, the three, effect and so on, are explained as follows: For example, smoke is a reason for the effect of fire.

original: des na ji skad brjod pa'i rim pa'i rjes su 'brang ste /
analyzed: des na ji skad brjod pa'i rim pa'i rjes su 'brang ste /
translated: Therefore, following the order in which they were stated,

original: dang po 'bras bu nye bar bkod la gnyis pa ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dang po 'bras bu nye bar bkod la gnyis pa ni rang bzhin no //
translated: The first is the statement of the effect, and the second is the statement of the nature.

original: tha mar ni mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: tha mar ni mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The last is the statement of non-apprehension.

original: gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya gnyis bkod pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya gnyis bkod pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement of the two, reason and probandum, is for the purpose of teaching the nature of cause and effect.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni /
translated: The reason of nature is

original: shing sha pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing sha pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree.

original: 'dir yang gnyi ga nye bar bstan pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid du rab tu bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dir yang gnyi ga nye bar bstan pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid du rab tu bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: Here, the statement of both is for the purpose of teaching the reason of nature,

original: de gnyis gcig gi bdag nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //üîΩmi @13a * //
analyzed: de gnyis gcig gi bdag nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro // mi @13a * //
translated: because those two are established as the same nature.

original: dmigs pa ni phyogs kyi khyad par zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni phyogs kyi khyad par zhes bya'o //
translated: Non-apprehension is called a particular locus.

original: phyogs kyi khyad par ni phyogs khyad par can yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin la de yang so sor nges pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi khyad par ni phyogs khyad par can yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin la de yang so sor nges pa yin no //
translated: A particular locus is a specific locus, not everything, and it is also determined individually.

original: de ci 'di nyid dam 'on te gzhan nyid ces mi shes pas na 'ga' zhig na zhes smos te /
analyzed: de ci 'di nyid dam 'on te gzhan nyid ces mi shes pas na 'ga' zhig na zhes smos te /
translated: Since it is not known whether it is this or something else, it is said somewhere.

original: 'di yang khyad par nges par nye bar bkod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di yang khyad par nges par nye bar bkod pa nyid do //
translated: This is also a special application of the ascertainment.

original: des na snga mas ni thams cad du yin pa bkag la 'dis ni khyad par de'i ngo bo rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i gcod pa po rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na snga mas ni thams cad du yin pa bkag la 'dis ni khyad par de'i ngo bo rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i gcod pa po rtog pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the former refutes the universal, and this refutes the conceptualizer who posits the nature of that particular.

original: de yang sgrub byed nye bar ston pa na phyogs la sogs pa shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag can tshad mas rtogs pa yin par khong du chud pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang sgrub byed nye bar ston pa na phyogs la sogs pa shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag can tshad mas rtogs pa yin par khong du chud pa nyid do //
translated: Moreover, when the proof is presented, the particular of the subject, etc., which is desired to be known, is understood to be apprehended by a valid cognition.

original: chos can de na bum pa med de zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i dngos po med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos can de na bum pa med de zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i dngos po med pa nyid do //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThere is no pot on that locus‚Äù means the nonexistence of the entity pot.

original: gtan tshigs brjod pa ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs brjod pa ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The statement of the reason is ‚Äúbecause of nonapprehension.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It means because of the nonexistence of the apprehension.

original: gzhan mi dmigs pas ni gzhan med par mi sgrub pas na skabs kyi bum pa nyid mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan mi dmigs pas ni gzhan med par mi sgrub pas na skabs kyi bum pa nyid mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Since the nonapprehension of another does not prove the nonexistence of another, the nonapprehension is of the pot in the present context.

original: gang mi dmigs so cog de med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang mi dmigs so cog de med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that whatever is not apprehended does not exist.

original: snga na med pa dang 'jig rten gzhan la sogs pa mi dmigs kyang mi ldog pa'i phyir dang / yul dang dus la sogs pas bskal pa'i bum pa la sogs pa yang med par nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga na med pa dang 'jig rten gzhan la sogs pa mi dmigs kyang mi ldog pa'i phyir dang / yul dang dus la sogs pas bskal pa'i bum pa la sogs pa yang med par nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even though the prior nonexistence, other world, etc. are not perceived, they are not negated, and because it is not possible to ascertain the nonexistence of a pot, etc. that is separated by place, time, etc.

original: des na dngos po tsam ni mi dmigs pa tsam gyis med par bsgrub par mi nus pas sgrub par byed pa yang nges pa dgos pa yin la /
analyzed: des na dngos po tsam ni mi dmigs pa tsam gyis med par bsgrub par mi nus pas sgrub par byed pa yang nges pa dgos pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, since it is not possible to establish the nonexistence of mere things by the mere nonperception, the proof must also have a necessary connection.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang yin no //
translated: And it is the probandum.

original: des na dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: des na dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚Äúthat which has become the characteristic of perception.‚Äù

original: 'dis mtshon cing gsal bar byed pas na mtshan nyid do //üîΩdmigs pa nyid mtshan nyid yin pas dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid de der gyur pa'am /
analyzed: 'dis mtshon cing gsal bar byed pas na mtshan nyid do // dmigs pa nyid mtshan nyid yin pas dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid de der gyur pa'am /
translated: It is a characteristic because it is indicated and clarified by this.

original: des gyur cing thob pa'i yul du byas pa'o //
analyzed: des gyur cing thob pa'i yul du byas pa'o //
translated: Since perception itself is a characteristic, it is the characteristic of perception. It has become that, or it has become that and has been made an object.

original: dngos po rtags la sogs pa mtshon pas de rnam par bcad pa'i phyir dmigs pa smos so //
analyzed: dngos po rtags la sogs pa mtshon pas de rnam par bcad pa'i phyir dmigs pa smos so //
translated: In order to indicate that it is a sign, etc. of a thing, perception is mentioned in order to eliminate that.

original: de dag gi rtogs par bya ba'i dngos po ni rtogs pa mi 'jug pas med par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi rtogs par bya ba'i dngos po ni rtogs pa mi 'jug pas med par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The object to be understood by those is not established as nonexistent because it is not the case that understanding does not occur.

original: mngon du byed pa'i dmigs pa'i yul gyi dngos po ni rtogs pa med pas med pa nyid do /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa'i dmigs pa'i yul gyi dngos po ni rtogs pa med pas med pa nyid do /
translated: The object that is the objective domain of the manifestation of understanding is nonexistent because understanding does not occur.

original: 'dir mi dmigs pa ni skabs kyis bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa nyid bzung ba yin zhing de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa dang 'brel pas khyad par du byas pa yin pa des na bum pa de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa yin no
analyzed: 'dir mi dmigs pa ni skabs kyis bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa nyid bzung ba yin zhing de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa dang 'brel pas khyad par du byas pa yin pa des na bum pa de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa yin no
translated: Here, nonapprehension is taken to be related to the probandum in the context, and that is qualified by being related to the characteristic of apprehension. Therefore, the vase is also the characteristic of apprehension.

original: // des na bum pa med do @13b zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid kyi bum pa dgag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: // des na bum pa med do @13b zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid kyi bum pa dgag par bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, ‚ÄúThe vase does not exist‚Äù is the negation of the vase that is the manifest.

original: rgyu'i nang du rtogs btsam gyis ni dgag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i nang du rtogs btsam gyis ni dgag pa ma yin te /
translated: The negation is not merely the understanding of the cause.

original: zla ba gnyis su snang ba zla ba la yang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis su snang ba zla ba la yang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it follows that the appearance of two moons is the moon.

original: mi dmigs pa yang rnam pa de lta bu dang 'brel pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa yang rnam pa de lta bu dang 'brel pa yin gyi /
translated: Nonapprehension is related in that way.

original: mi dmigs pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not merely the non-apprehension of something.

original: de na 'di ni gtan tshigs kyi khyad par yin yang gnyi ga nye bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de na 'di ni gtan tshigs kyi khyad par yin yang gnyi ga nye bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Although this is a special reason, both are stated.

original: gal te 'di ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i bum pa med de ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas kyang rtags khyad par du byas par 'gyur ba nyid de /
analyzed: gal te 'di ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i bum pa med de ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas kyang rtags khyad par du byas par 'gyur ba nyid de /
translated: If it is said that the pot, which is characterized by being apprehended, does not exist because it is not apprehended, then the reason is also specified.

original: de dang 'brel pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is stated in relation to that.

original: des na de ltar yang ci ste mi ston zhe na brjod pa sgrub par byed pa nye bar dgod pa la bsgrub bya bstan pa yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: des na de ltar yang ci ste mi ston zhe na brjod pa sgrub par byed pa nye bar dgod pa la bsgrub bya bstan pa yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Therefore, why is it not taught in that way? It is said that the statement of the probandum is not a part of the statement of the proof.
