original: de de la gnas par mi rtogs pas khyad par khong du chud par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de de la gnas par mi rtogs pas khyad par khong du chud par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not understood that it abides there, the distinction is not understood.

original: 'o na 'dir ci'i don du bsgrub par bya ba bstan zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'dir ci'i don du bsgrub par bya ba bstan zhe na /
translated: Then, for what purpose is the probandum stated here?

original: sbyor ba gsal ba'i don nyid du'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba gsal ba'i don nyid du'o //
translated: For the purpose of clarifying the syllogism.

original: 'dir ni gtan tshigs kyi rang bzhin tsam brjod par 'dod pa yin gyi bsgrub bya grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni gtan tshigs kyi rang bzhin tsam brjod par 'dod pa yin gyi bsgrub bya grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, we wish to state only the nature of the reason, not to establish the probandum.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ma bstan pas bsgrub bya mi rtogs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni gtan tshigs ma yin no snyam du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ma bstan pas bsgrub bya mi rtogs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni gtan tshigs ma yin no snyam du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, since the concomitance, etc., are not taught, one might think that the non-apprehension, which does not prove the probandum, is not a logical reason.

original: mi dmigs pa ni dngos po dngos po med par bsgrub pa la rtogs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni dngos po dngos po med par bsgrub pa la rtogs pa med pa yin no //
translated: Non-apprehension is the non-perception of an existent thing as non-existent.

original: de bzhin du bshad pa'i sbyor ba gnyis la yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bshad pa'i sbyor ba gnyis la yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The two syllogisms explained in this way should be understood in the same manner.

original: yang ji ltar na gang zhig med pa de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa yin /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na gang zhig med pa de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa yin /
translated: Moreover, how can that which is non-existent be characterized by the perception of something?

original: de ltar yin na yang ji ltar med pa nyid du brjod ce na /
analyzed: de ltar yin na yang ji ltar med pa nyid du brjod ce na /
translated: Even if it were so, how can it be said to be non-existent?

original: 'di ni rmongs pa'i yul can brtsad par bya ba ma yin pa rtsod pa yin te bum pa med do zhes bya ba 'dir bum pa yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni rmongs pa'i yul can brtsad par bya ba ma yin pa rtsod pa yin te bum pa med do zhes bya ba 'dir bum pa yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is a dispute about what should not be disputed, which is the domain of delusion, because in saying ‚Äúthe pot does not exist,‚Äù the pot would also be entailed in that.

original: gang zhig med pa de ni bum pa ma yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig med pa de ni bum pa ma yin la /
translated: That which does not exist is not a pot.

original: bum pa gang yin pa de yang med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa gang yin pa de yang med pa ma yin te /
translated: And that which is a pot does not not exist.

original: de ltar ma yin na ji ltar bum pa med ces 'gog / de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na ji ltar bum pa med ces 'gog / de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If it were not so, how could one negate ‚Äúa pot does not exist‚Äù?

original: gang gi phyir gang gis 'gal bar 'gyur ba bum pa rnam par gzhag nas dgag pa bsgrub pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gis 'gal bar 'gyur ba bum pa rnam par gzhag nas dgag pa bsgrub pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: That is not logical, because it is not that a negation is established by positing a pot that would be contradictory.

original: 'on kyang de ni bum pa med par rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang de ni bum pa med par rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: Rather, it is just the understanding of the nonexistence of a pot.

original: 'on kyang der bum pa ni yul nyid kyis rtogs pa la nye bar mkho bar zad de /
analyzed: 'on kyang der bum pa ni yul nyid kyis rtogs pa la nye bar mkho bar zad de /
translated: But in that case, a pot is just needed for the understanding of the object.

original: des na rtogs par 'jug pa tsam 'gal ba @14a * //
analyzed: des na rtogs par 'jug pa tsam 'gal ba @14a * //
translated: Therefore, the mere engagement in understanding is contradictory.

original: yin gyi rtogs par bya ba 'gal ba ni ma yin no //üîΩde ni / de 'dra med par chos can de //üîΩde dag dang ni 'brel par snang //
analyzed: yin gyi rtogs par bya ba 'gal ba ni ma yin no // de ni / de 'dra med par chos can de // de dag dang ni 'brel par snang //
translated: But the object of understanding is not contradictory.

original: zhes rnam par nges pa yang phyi rol la brten pa nyid bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes rnam par nges pa yang phyi rol la brten pa nyid bkag pa yin no //
translated: And that is also a refutation of external objects in the line:üîΩ‚ÄúThat is seen to be related to those without such a nature.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir bum pa med do zhes bya ba dang / bltar rung ba'i bum pa med do zhes 'gog pa la ni khyad par med do //üîΩres 'ga' skyes bu med do zhe'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir bum pa med do zhes bya ba dang / bltar rung ba'i bum pa med do zhes 'gog pa la ni khyad par med do // res 'ga' skyes bu med do zhe'am /
translated: Therefore, there is no difference between the refutations ‚ÄúThe pot does not exist‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe visible pot does not exist.‚Äù

original: res 'ga' skyes bu dkar sham med do zhes khyad par stong phrag gis nye bar bsgyur ba 'gog kyang rung ste /üîΩdngos po gang dang gang med pa de dang de med par sgrub pa na de ji lta bur gyur pa de lta bur gyur pa nyid khyad par dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: res 'ga' skyes bu dkar sham med do zhes khyad par stong phrag gis nye bar bsgyur ba 'gog kyang rung ste / dngos po gang dang gang med pa de dang de med par sgrub pa na de ji lta bur gyur pa de lta bur gyur pa nyid khyad par dang bcas pa'am /
translated: Sometimes one refutes by means of thousands of distinctions, as in ‚ÄúThe man does not exist‚Äù or ‚ÄúThe white man does not exist.‚Äù

original: khyad par med pa yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: khyad par med pa yin yang rung ste /
translated: But when one proves the non-existence of any given thing, then, no matter what it is, whether it has a distinction or not,

original: yul nyid du 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: yul nyid du 'jog pa yin no //
translated: it is established as an object of knowledge.

original: khyad par can sgrub pa na de'i khyad par thabs gzhan gyis grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par can sgrub pa na de'i khyad par thabs gzhan gyis grub pa ma yin te /
translated: When one proves a qualified thing, its qualification is not established by another means.

original: 'on kyang ji ltar tsandan gyi du ba rtogs na de nyid las de'i me grub pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'on kyang ji ltar tsandan gyi du ba rtogs na de nyid las de'i me grub pa de bzhin du /
translated: But just as when one perceives the smoke of sandalwood, one infers the fire of sandalwood,

original: bltar rung ba'i bum pa med pa grub par byed pa ni bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bltar rung ba'i bum pa med pa grub par byed pa ni bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: so the non-perception of the visible establishes the non-existence of the visible pot.

original: 'dir ni 'di tsam zhig brjod par bya bar zad de /
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di tsam zhig brjod par bya bar zad de /
translated: Here, this much should be stated:

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni sgrub byed kyi yan lag ma yin pas na de ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu ni rnam pa nyid du grub pa la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni sgrub byed kyi yan lag ma yin pas na de ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu ni rnam pa nyid du grub pa la ltos pa yin te /
translated: Since a reason that is not established is not a part of the proof, it must be established in the same way that the property to be established is established.

original: tsandan gyi du ba bzhin no //
analyzed: tsandan gyi du ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the smoke of sandalwood.

original: des na 'dir bltar rung pa ji ltar grub ces dpyod pa ni rigs kyi bum pa bltar rung ba ji ltar yin zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir bltar rung pa ji ltar grub ces dpyod pa ni rigs kyi bum pa bltar rung ba ji ltar yin zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to analyze here, ‚ÄúHow is that which is suitable to appear established?‚Äù but not, ‚ÄúHow is the vase that is suitable to appear?‚Äù

original: shes pa gcig gis bzung ba dag las gcig dmigs pa na gzhan mi dmigs pa ni bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa zhes bya bar grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: shes pa gcig gis bzung ba dag las gcig dmigs pa na gzhan mi dmigs pa ni bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa zhes bya bar grub pa kho na'o //
translated: It is established that when one of two things that are apprehended by a single cognition is observed, the other is not observed, and this is called ‚Äúthe nonobservation of what is suitable to appear.‚Äù

original: ji skad bshad pa'i khyad par gyi khyad par can du gyur pa'i gtan tshigs nyid 'khrul pa med pa yin gyi //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i khyad par gyi khyad par can du gyur pa'i gtan tshigs nyid 'khrul pa med pa yin gyi //
translated: The reason that has the special feature explained above is the only one that is nondeceptive.

original: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes ston pa na khyad par nye bar bkod pa'i 'bras bu 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes ston pa na khyad par nye bar bkod pa'i 'bras bu 'chad pa ni /
translated: The result of positing a special feature is explained in order to show that the others are not.

original: gal te yod na zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te yod na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If it exists, then . . .

original: gal te bum pa yod par gyur gyi med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te bum pa yod par gyur gyi med pa ma yin no //
translated: If the pot existed and did not not exist,

original: de'i tshe dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i yod pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i yod pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be only existent, having the character of being perceived.

original: bltar rung ba kho nar 'gyur gyi ;
analyzed: bltar rung ba kho nar 'gyur gyi ;
translated: It would be only visible,

original: bltar mi rung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bltar mi rung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: and not invisible.

original: gang gi phyir 'di dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa nyid dmigs pa yin pa des na 'dir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba dngos po med pa dngos po yod pa'i mtshan nyid la 'gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa nyid dmigs pa yin pa des na 'dir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba dngos po med pa dngos po yod pa'i mtshan nyid la 'gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is only having the character of being perceived that it is perceived, therefore here the non-existence of the object of refutation is not the character of the existence of the object.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i dngos po ni mngon sum pa la brjod @14b do ;
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i dngos po ni mngon sum pa la brjod @14b do ;
translated: An entity having the character of being perceived is said to be directly perceptible.

original: / gal te de yod na ni mngon sum kho nar 'gyur pa des na 'dir ni mi dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: / gal te de yod na ni mngon sum kho nar 'gyur pa des na 'dir ni mi dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it existed, it would be only directly perceptible. Therefore here it would not be non-apprehended,

original: rtogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be cognized.

original: des na khyad par dang bcas pa'i gtan tshigs ni 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: des na khyad par dang bcas pa'i gtan tshigs ni 'khrul pa med do //
translated: Therefore the reason, together with its qualification, is non-erroneous.

original: de nyid kyi phyir des na zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir des na zhes smos so //
translated: It is precisely because of this that ‚Äútherefore‚Äù is stated.

original: bsam pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur ba zhes bya bas ni 'dir dngos po'i rang bzhin nges pa can bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur ba zhes bya bas ni 'dir dngos po'i rang bzhin nges pa can bzung ba yin no //
translated: The phrase that has the nature of an object indicates that the nature of the object is ascertained.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa ni dmigs pas gzung ba'i rang bzhin khyad par can gyi dngos po bltar rung ba brjod pa yin te des na mthong bas bzung ba'i rang bzhin mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan du nges pa gang yin pa de mthong ba med par ji
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa ni dmigs pas gzung ba'i rang bzhin khyad par can gyi dngos po bltar rung ba brjod pa yin te des na mthong bas bzung ba'i rang bzhin mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan du nges pa gang yin pa de mthong ba med par ji
translated: The phrase that has the nature of an object means that the nature of the object that is perceived is ascertained as a visible entity. Therefore, how could the ascertainment of the nature of the object that is perceived as the reason for seeing occur in the absence of seeing?

original: ltar 'gyur des gang la dmigs pa mi 'khrul par gyur pa na khyad par gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin nges par byas pa yin no //üîΩde med na ni dngos po'i rang bzhin nges pa rjes su zhugs pa med pas yod pa'i dngos po la yang mi dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltar 'gyur des gang la dmigs pa mi 'khrul par gyur pa na khyad par gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin nges par byas pa yin no // de med na ni dngos po'i rang bzhin nges pa rjes su zhugs pa med pas yod pa'i dngos po la yang mi dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, when the object of the perception is not in error, the nature of the object that is distinguished is ascertained.üîΩIf it did not exist, then the ascertainment of the nature of the object would not occur, and the nonperception of an existent object would occur.

original: gal te mi dmigs pa rnams kyi yang med pa ni dngos po med bsgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te mi dmigs pa rnams kyi yang med pa ni dngos po med bsgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: If the nonperception of something does not prove the nonexistence of that thing,

original: des na 'dir yang dngos po nyid las dngos po 'grub pa'i phyir dang / de yang 'bras bu dang rang bzhin las mi 'da' ba'i phyir /
analyzed: des na 'dir yang dngos po nyid las dngos po 'grub pa'i phyir dang / de yang 'bras bu dang rang bzhin las mi 'da' ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, here also, because a thing is established from a thing itself, and that also does not go beyond the result and the nature,

original: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin nyid rang gi bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar dgod par rigs kyi mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin nyid rang gi bsgrub par bya ba la nye bar dgod par rigs kyi mi dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is reasonable to posit the result and the nature themselves as the proof of the probandum, but non-observation is not.

original: de las zhes smos so //
analyzed: de las zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says from that.

original: ji skad nye bar bstan pa'i gtan tshigs gsum las 'bras bu dang / rang bzhin gnyis ni dngos po sgrub pa yin te /üîΩ'di gnyis kyis ni 'di na me yod do //
analyzed: ji skad nye bar bstan pa'i gtan tshigs gsum las 'bras bu dang / rang bzhin gnyis ni dngos po sgrub pa yin te / 'di gnyis kyis ni 'di na me yod do //
translated: From among the three reasons that have been taught, the result and the nature are the establishment of a thing.

original: 'di ni shing yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni shing yin no //
translated: By these two, one understands, Here, there is fire. Here, there is smoke. Here, there is a tree. Here, there is a pot.

original: dngos po grub kyi /
analyzed: dngos po grub kyi /
translated: A thing is established.

original: 'ga' zhig dngos po med par rtogs par bya ba la ni 'di gnyis nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig dngos po med par rtogs par bya ba la ni 'di gnyis nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no //
translated: But these two are not applied to the understanding of the non-existence of something.

original: des na bum pa med pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya dag la ni 'di gnyis sbyor ba mi srid pas na dgag pa'i gtan tshigs logs su bkod do /
analyzed: des na bum pa med pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya dag la ni 'di gnyis sbyor ba mi srid pas na dgag pa'i gtan tshigs logs su bkod do /
translated: Therefore, it is impossible to apply these two to objects of comprehension such as the non-existence of a pot, and so on. Thus, a separate reason of negation is stated.

original: de lta ma yin na ni de mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni de mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, then it would not be understood.

original: de yang mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: And that is non-apprehension.

original: 'on kyang de ni gang las 'di'i dgag pa rtogs par 'gyur ba nyid don gzhan gyi bdag nyid can 'jig rten pa'i rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i dgag pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de ni gang las 'di'i dgag pa rtogs par 'gyur ba nyid don gzhan gyi bdag nyid can 'jig rten pa'i rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i dgag pa nyid yin te /
translated: But it is the negation itself which is the cause of the understanding of the negation of that, and which is the very nature of the other object, and which is the negation that follows the worldly idea.

original: des na dngos po'i sgrub par byed pa nyid las ma nyams so zhes ston par 'gyur ro //üîΩdes na de ltar nges par 'gyur ba'i tshul gsum gyis @15a * //
analyzed: des na dngos po'i sgrub par byed pa nyid las ma nyams so zhes ston par 'gyur ro // des na de ltar nges par 'gyur ba'i tshul gsum gyis @15a * //
translated: Thus, it shows that it does not fail to be the proof of the thing.üîΩTherefore, it is proper to explain that the three modes are the means of ascertaining the pervasion.

original: zin pa bshad par rigs par bya ba yin pas phyogs kyi chos nyid ni mngon sum la sogs pas kyang shes par bla ba'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag bstan pa'i phyir tshul gsum po gsum po gsum la nye bar bsdus te de gsum stonüîΩpa yin no //
analyzed: zin pa bshad par rigs par bya ba yin pas phyogs kyi chos nyid ni mngon sum la sogs pas kyang shes par bla ba'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag bstan pa'i phyir tshul gsum po gsum po gsum la nye bar bsdus te de gsum stonüîΩpa yin no //
translated: Since the property of the subject is easily understood by means of perception and so on, in order to teach the positive and negative concomitance, the three modes are taught by summarizing them into three.

original: da ni gsum la ji ltar 'grub pa de bstan pa'i phyir rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na zhes smos so //üîΩgang gi phyir rang bzhin zhes 'brel pa zhes bya ba rag las pa dang gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa de yod na /
analyzed: da ni gsum la ji ltar 'grub pa de bstan pa'i phyir rang bzhin 'brel pa yod na zhes smos so // gang gi phyir rang bzhin zhes 'brel pa zhes bya ba rag las pa dang gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa de yod na /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate how the three modes are established, he says, ‚ÄúIf there is a relation of intrinsic nature,‚Äù and so on.

original: rtags kyi mtshan nyid kyi don gyis rtags can gyi don 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: rtags kyi mtshan nyid kyi don gyis rtags can gyi don 'khrul pa med do //
translated: Because of the relation of intrinsic nature, the meaning of the evidence is not mistaken with regard to the meaning of the property to be proven.

original: mi 'khrul pa yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i bdag nyid can ;
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i bdag nyid can ;
translated: And non-mistakenness is the very nature of positive and negative concomitance.

original: de la sgrub par byed pa yod na bsgrub par bya ba yod pa dang bsgrub par bya ba med na med par brjod do //
analyzed: de la sgrub par byed pa yod na bsgrub par bya ba yod pa dang bsgrub par bya ba med na med par brjod do //
translated: In that regard, when the evidence exists, the property to be proven exists, and when the property to be proven does not exist, the evidence does not exist.

original: des na gang gi tshe gang gi rang bzhin gang gi gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa de nyid rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag tu 'thad pa de'i tshe gsum nyid la tshul gsum yod pa yin te /
analyzed: des na gang gi tshe gang gi rang bzhin gang gi gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa de nyid rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag tu 'thad pa de'i tshe gsum nyid la tshul gsum yod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, when the very intrinsic nature of the evidence, which is dependent on the property to be proven, is tenable as positive and negative concomitance, at that time the three modes exist in the three.

original: gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no positive or negative concomitance with anything else.

original: gsum la tshul gsum 'brel pas grub par ston pa na de dag nyid la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bsgrub par nus pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no /
analyzed: gsum la tshul gsum 'brel pas grub par ston pa na de dag nyid la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bsgrub par nus pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no /
translated: When it is shown that the three modes are related, it is possible to establish the pervasion and counter-pervasion.

original: des na de rnams la de gnyis kyi nges pa'i rgyu ni 'di nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no /
analyzed: des na de rnams la de gnyis kyi nges pa'i rgyu ni 'di nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no /
translated: Thus, it is explained that these three are the definite causes of those two.

original: 'di ltar yod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams ni gsum po dag las gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar yod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs rnams ni gsum po dag las gzhan ma yin la /
translated: In this way, the reasons of existence, being produced, and so on are not other than the three.

original: gsum po rnams la yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rang bzhin 'brel bas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsum po rnams la yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rang bzhin 'brel bas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the three are established by the relation of nature, which is the pervasion and counter-pervasion.

original: de dag kyang de'i rtsa ba can nyid kyis grub par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang de'i rtsa ba can nyid kyis grub par brjod pa yin no //
translated: And since those two are rooted in that, they are said to be established.

original: de ltar na yang 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pa gsum gtan tshigs yin pa ga las shes dogs na rang bzhin 'brel pa gsum la nges par bstan pa'i phyir rtsom pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pa gsum gtan tshigs yin pa ga las shes dogs na rang bzhin 'brel pa gsum la nges par bstan pa'i phyir rtsom pa ni de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow do we know that the three‚Äîeffect, nature, and non-observation‚Äîare reasons?‚Äù the author composes the text beginning with ‚Äúthat‚Äù in order to definitely teach the three relations.

original: rtags rtags can la rang bzhin 'bral par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags rtags can la rang bzhin 'bral par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason is explained as being the absence of intrinsic reality in the property-possessor, because it is the nature of that.

original: gang zhig gang la mi 'khrul pa de ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la mi 'khrul pa de ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: That which is non-erroneous with regard to something is the nature of that,

original: sgrub par byed pa ni bsgrub par bya ba chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni bsgrub par bya ba chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because the proof is the nature of the property to be proven. This is the meaning.

original: go bar byed pa'i dbang du byas nas de'i bdag nyid du bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: go bar byed pa'i dbang du byas nas de'i bdag nyid du bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In terms of the means of understanding, in order to show that it is the nature of that,

original: go bar byed pa ni chos nyid do //
analyzed: go bar byed pa ni chos nyid do //
translated: the means of understanding is reality.

original: des na sgrub par @15b byed pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sgrub par @15b byed pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin du brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the proof itself is stated to be the nature of the probandum.

original: des na gang la khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin nges pa ma bsams pa'i blo can gzhan dag lan 'debs par sems //
analyzed: des na gang la khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin nges pa ma bsams pa'i blo can gzhan dag lan 'debs par sems //
translated: Therefore, others who have not considered the certainty of the nature of the pervasion think to respond.

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa khyad par med par rtsod pa'i skabs ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa khyad par med par rtsod pa'i skabs ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no occasion for dispute over the non-distinction of the understood and the means of understanding.

original: gang zhig nyid gang gi rang bzhin ma yin pa de nyid rang gi ngo bo de go bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig nyid gang gi rang bzhin ma yin pa de nyid rang gi ngo bo de go bar byed pa yin la /
translated: That which is not the nature of something is not the nature of that thing.üîΩ

original: gang zhig de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni de go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni de go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not the nature of something does not make known that nature.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is not its nature does not make it known, because there is no connection.

original: gang gi phyir de 'di'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir de 'dir yang rang bzhin 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de 'di'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir de 'dir yang rang bzhin 'brel pa yin te /
translated: Since that is its nature, therefore, its nature is connected to it here.

original: rang gi ngo bor rang gi bdag nyid kyi gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor rang gi bdag nyid kyi gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is dependent on its own nature,

original: sha pa'i yal ga dang ldan pa nyid bzhin no //üîΩsha pa nyid ni ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid yin te /
analyzed: sha pa'i yal ga dang ldan pa nyid bzhin no // sha pa nyid ni ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid yin te /
translated: like the nature of a mango tree that possesses branches.üîΩThe nature of a mango tree is the particular that possesses a mother, etc.

original: des na khyad par gzhan du gyur pa ma yin pa lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid du gyur ba'i sha pa'i rang bzhin ni shing nyid te des na de ni de'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: des na khyad par gzhan du gyur pa ma yin pa lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid du gyur ba'i sha pa'i rang bzhin ni shing nyid te des na de ni de'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid du gyur pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of a mango tree is a tree, which is not a different particular that possesses leaves, etc. Thus, it is dependent on that.

original: khyad par can du gyur pa'i lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sha ba nyid gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin ni lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te des na lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par can du gyur pa'i lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sha ba nyid gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin ni lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te des na lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The nature of the very deer that possesses the special leaves, etc. is the possession of leaves, etc. Therefore, it possesses leaves, etc.

original: khyad par du gyur pa de yang sha pa yin pa'i phyir de shing nyid la 'khrul ba med do //
analyzed: khyad par du gyur pa de yang sha pa yin pa'i phyir de shing nyid la 'khrul ba med do //
translated: And since that special deer is a tree, there is no error in that tree.

original: shing nyid kyi rang bzhin ni sha pa yin pa'i phyir de ni de'i go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shing nyid kyi rang bzhin ni sha pa yin pa'i phyir de ni de'i go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature of a tree is a deer, and therefore it is not the indicator of that.

original: lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa tsam gyi rang bzhin yin pas khyad par nges pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir na khyad par gzhan dang gcig pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa tsam gyi rang bzhin yin pas khyad par nges pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir na khyad par gzhan dang gcig pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is the nature of mere possession of leaves, etc., it does not depend on the ascertainment of a special property, and therefore it is impossible for it to be the same as another special property.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyang mi rtags pa'i bdag nyid can yin gyi bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyang mi rtags pa'i bdag nyid can yin gyi bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The nature of arising from effort is the nature of being non-permanent, not the opposite.

original: dngos po rnams ni 'jig pa la ltos pa med pa las byung ma thag tu nges pas 'jig pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po rnams ni 'jig pa la ltos pa med pa las byung ma thag tu nges pas 'jig pa yin la /
translated: Things arise without depending on destruction, and are certain to be destroyed immediately after arising.

original: dngos po yang rtsol ba las byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po yang rtsol ba las byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and an entity is also produced by effort.

original: 'di'i 'jig pa ni nges pa nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: 'di'i 'jig pa ni nges pa nyid yin pas na /
translated: Since its destruction is certain,

original: 'di ni 'jig pa'i ngang can gyi bdag nyid yin no ;
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig pa'i ngang can gyi bdag nyid yin no ;
translated: it has the nature of being subject to destruction.

original: / mi rtag pa nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba'i rang bzhin can nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: / mi rtag pa nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba'i rang bzhin can nyid ma yin no //
translated: Impermanence does not have the nature of being produced by effort.

original: de bzhin du byas pa nyid la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa nyid la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: The same applies to being a product and so on.

original: mi rtag pa nyid yod pa'i rang bzhin las ni mi 'da' ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid kyis yod pa zhes rtogs bar 'gyur ba nyid de dper na yod pas mi rtag pa'i zhes bya ba bzhin @16a * //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid yod pa'i rang bzhin las ni mi 'da' ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid kyis yod pa zhes rtogs bar 'gyur ba nyid de dper na yod pas mi rtag pa'i zhes bya ba bzhin @16a * //
translated: Since it does not pass beyond the nature of existing, impermanence is understood as existing, just as one says ‚Äúimpermanent because it exists.‚Äù

original: no ; / de bzhin du bum pa nyid kyang yod pa'i bdag nyid can yin la yod pa ni bum pas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: no ; / de bzhin du bum pa nyid kyang yod pa'i bdag nyid can yin la yod pa ni bum pas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The same applies to a pot, which is also of the nature of existing, and existing is empty of a pot.

original: de bzhin du sa'i rang bzhin dang dngul dag kyang yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sa'i rang bzhin dang dngul dag kyang yin te /
translated: The same applies to the nature of earth and silver.

original: gzhan yang de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the rest in the same way.

original: gal te byas pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dngos po dngos su tha mi dad pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te byas pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dngos po dngos su tha mi dad pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: If the nature of that which is produced and impermanent, etc. is not actually different from that entity,

original: des na dngos po'i gnas pa la sogs pa la mi ltos par rang gi bag chags kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pas tha dad pas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na dngos po'i gnas pa la sogs pa la mi ltos par rang gi bag chags kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pas tha dad pas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: then it is not dependent on the state of the entity, etc. and is realized by the conceptual thought that follows its own latent impressions, because it is different.

original: des na de'i rang bzhin dang bzlog pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'di gal te dngos po'i rang bzhin la ltos pa yin na ni de'i tshe nus pa ma yin te de la byas pa dang mi rtag pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na de'i rang bzhin dang bzlog pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'di gal te dngos po'i rang bzhin la ltos pa yin na ni de'i tshe nus pa ma yin te de la byas pa dang mi rtag pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the distinction of its nature and the opposite is dependent on the nature of the entity, then it is not possible, because the distinction of that which is produced and impermanent does not exist in that entity.

original: de med na mi rtag pa nyid 'di ni gzhan gyi rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: de med na mi rtag pa nyid 'di ni gzhan gyi rang bzhin yin la /
translated: If that does not exist, how could this impermanence be the nature of another?

original: de ni 'di ma yin no zhes bya bar ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de ni 'di ma yin no zhes bya bar ga la 'gyur /
translated: And how could that not be this?

original: 'on te rnam par rtog pas kun brtags pa'i chos la ltos pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par rtog pas kun brtags pa'i chos la ltos pa yin na /
translated: But if it is dependent on a phenomenon imagined by conceptual thought,

original: 'o na ni rnams par rtog pas byas pa yin pa'i phyir de las dngos po rnam par gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ni rnams par rtog pas byas pa yin pa'i phyir de las dngos po rnam par gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: But if that is so, then the nature of things is not established from that, because it is created by conceptualization.

original: 'dis gzhan gzhan gyi rang bzhin du ji ltar brtags pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na ltar yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'dis gzhan gzhan gyi rang bzhin du ji ltar brtags pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na ltar yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa ci zhig yod /
translated: What certainty is there that whatever is imagined as the nature of something else is just like that?

original: de lta na 'o na dngos po la khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / brtags pa la yang dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid gtan tshigs can gyi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po la bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi nges pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na dngos po la khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / brtags pa la yang dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid gtan tshigs can gyi bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po la bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi nges pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then because there is no difference in things, and because the imagined is not a thing, there is no certainty in the nature of the proof and the probandum, which are the basis of the reason.

original: ji ltar nges pa med pa gang gi phyir dngos po la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir mi 'khrul par nges pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ji ltar nges pa med pa gang gi phyir dngos po la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir mi 'khrul par nges pa nyid kyis so //
translated: How is there no certainty? Because there is no difference in things, there is no error. There is certainty.

original: de'i bdag nyid can ni med par mi 'byung ba'i phyir 'khrul pa med pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi rtsol ba las byung ba dang mi rtag pa gang yin pa de dag ni mi 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can ni med par mi 'byung ba'i phyir 'khrul pa med pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi rtsol ba las byung ba dang mi rtag pa gang yin pa de dag ni mi 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: Since it is not possible for it to be otherwise, it is not mistaken. Therefore, that which is produced by effort and impermanent in the nature of its own characteristic is not mistaken.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i rdzas kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i mi rtag pa nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba nyid 'dor ba ma yin la /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i rdzas kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i mi rtag pa nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba nyid 'dor ba ma yin la /
translated: The impermanence that is the nature of a substance produced by effort does not abandon its very nature of being produced by effort.

original: de yang 'dis mi 'dor ro //
analyzed: de yang 'dis mi 'dor ro //
translated: And that is not abandoned by this.

original: de bzhin du bum pa dang rdul dag kyang rdzas gzhan pa de lta ma yin par 'gyur yang rdzas gang la bdag gcig tu gyur pa'i rdzas de la 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa dang rdul dag kyang rdzas gzhan pa de lta ma yin par 'gyur yang rdzas gang la bdag gcig tu gyur pa'i rdzas de la 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //
translated: In the same way, even if a pot and its particles were not different substances, the substance that is the same substance as that would not be mistaken.

original: de dang de ma yin pa'i rdzas la yod pa'i chos gnyis po de ni gsal ba tha dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de dang de ma yin pa'i rdzas la yod pa'i chos gnyis po de ni gsal ba tha dad pa kho na'o //
translated: The two properties that exist in that and in what is not that are only different manifestations.

original: des na gzhan 'khrul pas gzhan de ltar mi 'gyur ba'i @16b phyir de'i bdag nyid la 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: des na gzhan 'khrul pas gzhan de ltar mi 'gyur ba'i @16b phyir de'i bdag nyid la 'khrul pa med do //
translated: Therefore, since one is not mistaken about the other due to the error of the other, there is no mistake in the nature of that.

original: 'o na ji ltar go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ma yin zhe na /
translated: But how can it be that there is no entity that is the object of understanding and the means of understanding?

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa la ltos pa yin te /
translated: The entity that is the object of understanding and the means of understanding is dependent on the basis of conceptualization,

original: rnam par rtog pa la mi gnas pa'i dngos po ni rtog par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la mi gnas pa'i dngos po ni rtog par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the entity that does not exist in conceptualization is not conceptualized.

original: rnam par rtog pa yang chos 'ga' zhig ni de dang de ma yin pa'i dngos por nges par byed de dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi mi rtag pa nyid de la mi 'khrul pa yin yang /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yang chos 'ga' zhig ni de dang de ma yin pa'i dngos por nges par byed de dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi mi rtag pa nyid de la mi 'khrul pa yin yang /
translated: Conceptualization determines some entity as this or that, for example, impermanence, which has the nature of arising from effort, is not mistaken with respect to that.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba dang rtsol ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du nges par byed pa'i phyir de'i zhen pas byas pa mi 'khrul pa de go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba dang rtsol ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du nges par byed pa'i phyir de'i zhen pas byas pa mi 'khrul pa de go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But because it determines the nature of that which arises from effort and that which does not arise from effort, the non-mistaken one produced by its attachment is not the means of understanding.

original: de bzhin du shing nyid kyang sha pa dang sha pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin la bum pa dang rdul nyid dag kyang de dang de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du shing nyid kyang sha pa dang sha pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin la bum pa dang rdul nyid dag kyang de dang de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: In the same way, a tree is of the nature of both a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ and not a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ, and a pot and atoms are of the nature of both that and not that.

original: sha pa nyid dang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni shing dang mi rtag par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: sha pa nyid dang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni shing dang mi rtag par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: A ≈õim≈õapƒÅ and that which arises immediately after exertion are only a tree and impermanent.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa yang de bzhin te go bar byed pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa yang de bzhin te go bar byed pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid du nges pa yin no //
translated: The same goes for being produced and so on. The indicator is ascertained to be of the nature of that.

original: de'i phyir 'khrul pa med pa yin yang rnam par rtog pa'i nyes pas 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa gcig tu nges pa'i phyir 'khrul pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khrul pa med pa yin yang rnam par rtog pa'i nyes pas 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa gcig tu nges pa'i phyir 'khrul pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, even though there is no error, due to the fault of conceptualization, error and non-error are ascertained as one, and thus there is error.

original: de'i phyir gang la skur pa 'di med pa de ni 'brel pa'i dbang gis go bar byed pa nyid do zhes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang la skur pa 'di med pa de ni 'brel pa'i dbang gis go bar byed pa nyid do zhes so //
translated: Therefore, that which is free from this deprecation is understood by the power of connection.

original: 'di yang gcol med pa nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi chos de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa rnams ni mi 'khrul par sbyor bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir brjod par mi 'os pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di yang gcol med pa nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi chos de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa rnams ni mi 'khrul par sbyor bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir brjod par mi 'os pa nyid do //
translated: This also is not a fault, because it is not proper to apply that which is not mistaken to a phenomenon that is of the nature of its own characteristic.

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan gyi mthar thug pa nyid de /
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan gyi mthar thug pa nyid de /
translated: The state of being the object to be understood and the means of understanding is the ultimate of the other‚Äôs own characteristic.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the property to be proven is the other‚Äôs own characteristic.

original: gal te de dag chos can gcig la bdag nyid du gcig tu zin kyang de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan la ma nges pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de mi 'khrul pa'i rgyu ma yin no ;
analyzed: gal te de dag chos can gcig la bdag nyid du gcig tu zin kyang de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan la ma nges pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de mi 'khrul pa'i rgyu ma yin no ;
translated: Even if those were to be ascertained as one in the one basis, if they were not ascertained as the other‚Äôs own characteristic, then at that time they would not be the cause of nonmistakenness.

original: / thams cad du de lta bur gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi 'khrul pa ni mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i rgyu can nyid yin pa bsal nas 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan can du rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / thams cad du de lta bur gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi 'khrul pa ni mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i rgyu can nyid yin pa bsal nas 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan can du rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
translated: In all cases, the non-erroneous nature of such a characteristic is established as having a reason of relation, after having eliminated the fact that it is merely a reason of the seen and the unseen.

original: gal te de'i bdag nyid yin te bum pa rdul yin zhes nges pa med na de las mi 'khrul pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de'i bdag nyid yin te bum pa rdul yin zhes nges pa med na de las mi 'khrul pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is of the nature of that, then if it is not ascertained that a pot is a particle, it is not non-erroneous with respect to that.

original: @17a * // rang gi mtshan nyid gcig gi mthar thug pa'i nges pa ni thams cad du yin no zhes nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: @17a * // rang gi mtshan nyid gcig gi mthar thug pa'i nges pa ni thams cad du yin no zhes nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to say that the ascertainment of a single characteristic is final in all cases.

original: 'on te rdul la brten pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'on te rdul la brten pa nyid yin na /
translated: But if it is based on a particle,

original: de'i tshe rdul gang yin pa de ni rdul nyid yin no zhes lugs log par bstan to //
analyzed: de'i tshe rdul gang yin pa de ni rdul nyid yin no zhes lugs log par bstan to //
translated: then it is taught in a perverse way that whatever is a particle is a particle.

original: de'i phyir bdag nyid gcig la mi 'khrul par brjod pa ni phongs pa sgrub par byed pa tsam du zad kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag nyid gcig la mi 'khrul par brjod pa ni phongs pa sgrub par byed pa tsam du zad kyi /
translated: Therefore, the statement that it is non-erroneous with respect to a single nature is merely an attempt to prove what is doubtful.

original: dngos po sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a proof of the thing itself.

original: gang zhig rnam par rtog pas bdag gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba sha pa'i bdag nyid can gyi shing gcig der nges pa yin yang gal te lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa de'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa gzhan nyid yod pa yin na /
analyzed: gang zhig rnam par rtog pas bdag gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba sha pa'i bdag nyid can gyi shing gcig der nges pa yin yang gal te lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa de'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa gzhan nyid yod pa yin na /
translated: If a tree that is the nature of a particular tree is ascertained as one, and if something else that is not the nature of that tree, such as its leaves, exists,

original: de'i tshe sha pa nyid kyang shing la 'khrul bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe sha pa nyid kyang shing la 'khrul bar 'gyur te /
translated: then the nature of the tree would be mistaken.

original: de'i phyir gzhan med do zhes ji ltar rtog / de'i bdag nyid ni gcig nyid la nges par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan med do zhes ji ltar rtog / de'i bdag nyid ni gcig nyid la nges par byed pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, how could it be ascertained that something else does not exist? The nature of that tree is ascertained as one.

original: des na de'i rigs can gyi chos gzhan ni bcad par mi nus so //
analyzed: des na de'i rigs can gyi chos gzhan ni bcad par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, it is impossible to eliminate another phenomenon that is of the same type.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar byas pa nyid mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yod par 'gyur zhing de yang rnam par rtog pas gcig tu nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar byas pa nyid mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yod par 'gyur zhing de yang rnam par rtog pas gcig tu nges pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, just as that which is produced has the nature of impermanence, so too would something else exist. Moreover, because it is ascertained as one by thought,

original: gzhan gyi rang bzhin gyi byas pa ma mthong yang 'khrul pa med par nges pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rang bzhin gyi byas pa ma mthong yang 'khrul pa med par nges pa med do //
translated: even though the nature of something else, such as being produced, is not seen, it is not ascertained without error.

original: gnod par byed pas gzhan la 'jug pa gcod do zhe na /
analyzed: gnod par byed pas gzhan la 'jug pa gcod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the refutation of the application of the adversary to the other,

original: 'brel ba nye bar bkod bas ci yang byar med do //
analyzed: 'brel ba nye bar bkod bas ci yang byar med do //
translated: then there is nothing to be done by the arrangement of the relation.

original: de gnyis kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa rtogs pas na /
analyzed: de gnyis kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa rtogs pas na /
translated: Since the two of them realize the non-existence in the discordant side,

original: bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi dngos por rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi dngos por rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the established entity of the probandum and the probans is not tenable.

original: dngos su na bsgrub bya sgrub byed dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dngos su na bsgrub bya sgrub byed dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because the probans and probandum are not different in reality,

original: tha mi dad pa de ni yod kyang go bar byed pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa de ni yod kyang go bar byed pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: that non-difference is not a part of the understanding, even if it exists.

original: tha dad kyang gnod par byed pa nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa rnam par bcad pa ni go bar byed pa kho na yin la de ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rtogs pa la yang grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad kyang gnod par byed pa nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa rnam par bcad pa ni go bar byed pa kho na yin la de ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rtogs pa la yang grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if there is difference, the mere refutation of the application of the adversary to the discordant side is the understanding itself, because it is established in the realization of the probandum.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir chos rnams de'i bdag nyid du grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir chos rnams de'i bdag nyid du grub bo zhe na /
translated: If you say that the entities are established in their own nature because there is no difference,

original: 'o na de tha dad pa bkag pa nyid kyis mthar phyin pa'i phyir 'brel pa bstan pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: 'o na de tha dad pa bkag pa nyid kyis mthar phyin pa'i phyir 'brel pa bstan pas ci zhig bya /
translated: But if the negation of difference is itself the final conclusion, what is the point of teaching a relation?

original: des na 'dir ni brjod par mi bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'dir ni brjod par mi bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, in this case, it would be inexpressible.

original: de'i phyir go bar byed pa go bar bya ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir go bar byed pa go bar bya ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid du brjod do //
translated: Hence, the revealer is said to be of the nature of the revealed because it is of the nature of the revealed.

original: 'di yang ji ltar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: 'di yang ji ltar 'grub ce na /
translated: How is this established?

original: mi 'grub par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: mi 'grub par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could it not be established?

original: gang gi phyir 'di la dngos po rnams rang bzhin phan @17b tshun tha dad pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la dngos po rnams rang bzhin phan @17b tshun tha dad pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because in this case, entities do not have a nature that is mutually different.

original: gcig gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de gzhan la med pa de ni 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa'i dpyod pa 'di'i rten ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de gzhan la med pa de ni 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa'i dpyod pa 'di'i rten ma yin no //
translated: The nature of one does not exist in another. That is not the basis of this analysis of error and non-error.

original: de la yod pa'i rang bzhin med pa gzhan la yod na 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: de la yod pa'i rang bzhin med pa gzhan la yod na 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: If the nature that exists in one does not exist in another, that is error.

original: dper na sgra byas pa de la yod pa'i byas pa nyid sgra med par bum pa la yod pa na sgra la 'khrul pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra byas pa de la yod pa'i byas pa nyid sgra med par bum pa la yod pa na sgra la 'khrul pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the error in regard to sound, when the product that exists in sound exists as the product that does not exist in sound in a pot.

original: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te //
translated: This is not so,

original: gcig nyid du thal bas na sgra ni bum pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid du thal bas na sgra ni bum pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the absurd consequence that it would be one, since sound does not exist in a pot.

original: de'i ni 'ga' yang de la med pa'i phyir 'di ji ltar 'khrul pa yin /
analyzed: de'i ni 'ga' yang de la med pa'i phyir 'di ji ltar 'khrul pa yin /
translated: Since nothing at all exists in it, how can there be an error in regard to it?

original: des na gal te de'i rang bzhin gzhan la srid pa ma yin pa de lta na byas pa nyid ni de la yod pa yin te /
analyzed: des na gal te de'i rang bzhin gzhan la srid pa ma yin pa de lta na byas pa nyid ni de la yod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, if its nature does not exist in another, then the product exists in it.

original: 'on kyang de la yod pa gang yin pa de nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de la yod pa gang yin pa de nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that which exists in it.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med kyang byas pa tsam yod pa la ltos te 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med kyang byas pa tsam yod pa la ltos te 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Even though there is no concomitance, there is an error in regard to the existence of mere product.

original: 'di ltar rgyu'i byed pa la grub pa gang yin pa de byas pa yin pa'i phyir sgra bzhin du bum pa yang de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu'i byed pa la grub pa gang yin pa de byas pa yin pa'i phyir sgra bzhin du bum pa yang de lta bu yin no //
translated: In this way, since that which is established by the activity of the cause is a product, a pot is like that, like sound.

original: des na de ltar de'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de gzhan la med pa yin gyi byas pa nyid ni yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na de ltar de'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de gzhan la med pa yin gyi byas pa nyid ni yod pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, the nature of that which is produced is not found in another, but that which is produced does exist.

original: des na rgyu'i de ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid kyis byas pa nyid yin yang nyan pas bzung ba'i bdag nyid bum pa la med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: des na rgyu'i de ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid kyis byas pa nyid yin yang nyan pas bzung ba'i bdag nyid bum pa la med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, although that which is produced exists by reason of its arising immediately after its cause, it is not found in the nature of sound, because it does not exist in a pot, which is grasped by hearing.

original: dper na sgra'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin no //
translated: For example, it is not the nature of sound.

original: de bzhin du gal te sgra bzhin du bum pa yang byung ma thag tu 'jig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te sgra bzhin du bum pa yang byung ma thag tu 'jig pa ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, if a pot is not destroyed immediately after it arises, like sound,

original: byas pa mi rtag pa dang 'khrul par 'gyur te /
analyzed: byas pa mi rtag pa dang 'khrul par 'gyur te /
translated: it would be produced but not impermanent.

original: dper na sgra'am bum pa rtag par the tshom za ba na mi rtag pa nyid las de la bstan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na sgra'am bum pa rtag par the tshom za ba na mi rtag pa nyid las de la bstan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, if one doubts whether sound or a pot is permanent, impermanence is not established in that.

original: des na ji ltar bum pa byas pa yin pa ltar sgra yang yin pas na byas pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar mi nus pa de bzhin du byas pa nyid mi rtag pa'i lus can yin pa'i phyir de yod na mi rtag pa nyid med pa
analyzed: des na ji ltar bum pa byas pa yin pa ltar sgra yang yin pas na byas pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar mi nus pa de bzhin du byas pa nyid mi rtag pa'i lus can yin pa'i phyir de yod na mi rtag pa nyid med pa
translated: Since production has the nature of impermanence, if production exists, impermanence cannot be nonexistent.

original: ma yin pa'i phyir chos bdag nyid gcig pa de'i bdag nyid nye bar 'god pa yin no //
analyzed: ma yin pa'i phyir chos bdag nyid gcig pa de'i bdag nyid nye bar 'god pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the phenomenon and the nature of that phenomenon are the same.

original: dngos po tha mi dad pa la ni ji ltar bum pas stong yang sgra byas pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dngos po tha mi dad pa la ni ji ltar bum pas stong yang sgra byas pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: If things are not different, then just as sound is produced even though a pot is not produced,

original: mi rtag pas stong par yang 'gyur ba'i phyir byas pa nyid las de mi rtag par 'gyur re skan /
analyzed: mi rtag pas stong par yang 'gyur ba'i phyir byas pa nyid las de mi rtag par 'gyur re skan /
translated: impermanence would exist in production because it would be empty of permanence, just as a pot is empty of impermanence.üîΩNow, how are the phenomena and the basis of the phenomena not different?

original: da ni ji ltar chos can tha mi dad ce na ji ltar zhes ci ste brjod /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar chos can tha mi dad ce na ji ltar zhes ci ste brjod /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúJust as,‚Äù then what?

original: chos ji lta ba bzhin du chos tha dad pa yang ma yin nam /
analyzed: chos ji lta ba bzhin du chos tha dad pa yang ma yin nam /
translated: Just as the phenomena are not different, are the phenomena and the basis of the phenomena not different?

original: 'di ltar 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa rnam par dpyod pa na gdon mi za bar byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rang bzhin @18a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa rnam par dpyod pa na gdon mi za bar byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i rang bzhin @18a * //
translated: Thus, when analyzing whether something is mistaken or nonmistaken, one must definitely analyze the nature of the object itself.üîΩ

original: bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: Thus, when one analyzes error and non-error, one must definitely teach the nature of that which is produced, etc.

original: de lta ma yin na gang zhig gzhan la yod pa dang med pas 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa dag tu 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gang zhig gzhan la yod pa dang med pas 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa dag tu 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, what exists or does not exist in another would be error or non-error.

original: rang bzhin nges par brtags pa gnyis po de ni gcig la ji ltar yod pa ltar gal te gzhan la yang 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: rang bzhin nges par brtags pa gnyis po de ni gcig la ji ltar yod pa ltar gal te gzhan la yang 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If the two kinds of ascertained natures exist in another as they do in one,

original: de'i tshe mi 'khrul ba min no //
analyzed: de'i tshe mi 'khrul ba min no //
translated: then it is not non-error.

original: 'on te gcig yod la gzhan ma yin na des na gcig gis gzhan la 'khrul pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te gcig yod la gzhan ma yin na des na gcig gis gzhan la 'khrul pa ma yin no //
translated: But if one exists and the other does not, then one does not err with respect to the other.

original: de la byas pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas rna bas gzung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir sgra ma yin yang bum pa'am bum pa ma yin yang sgra byas par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de la byas pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas rna bas gzung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir sgra ma yin yang bum pa'am bum pa ma yin yang sgra byas par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: In that case, that which is called ‚Äúproduced‚Äù is the nature related to a cause, and since it is not the nature apprehended by the ear, etc., it is not sound. But a pot or a non-pot can be produced.

original: 'di mi rtag pa nyid las 'da' ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di mi rtag pa nyid las 'da' ba ma yin no //
translated: This does not transcend impermanence.

original: byas pa nyid ni dngos po'i chos rgyus byas pa zhes bya ba yin la rgyu rnams kyang 'jig pa'i ngang can skyes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa'i dang can skyes par byed pa la skyes pa'i byas pa nyid 'jig pa'i ngang can ma yin par mi
analyzed: byas pa nyid ni dngos po'i chos rgyus byas pa zhes bya ba yin la rgyu rnams kyang 'jig pa'i ngang can skyes par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa'i dang can skyes par byed pa la skyes pa'i byas pa nyid 'jig pa'i ngang can ma yin par mi
translated: The quality of being produced is the quality of a thing that is produced by a cause. And since the causes are productive of what is perishable, the production of what is produced by a cause is not non-perishable.

original: 'gyur ro // des na 'di gang dang gcig par gyur pa de byas pa bzhin du 'jig pa'i ngang can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // des na 'di gang dang gcig par gyur pa de byas pa bzhin du 'jig pa'i ngang can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, whatever is one with that is perishable, like what is produced.

original: de bzhin du sha pa nyid kyang lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shing nyid kyi rang bzhin yin gyi shing nyid ni sha pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sha pa nyid kyang lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shing nyid kyi rang bzhin yin gyi shing nyid ni sha pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the quality of being a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ is the nature of a particular that possesses leaves, etc., and therefore is the nature of a tree, but a tree is not of the nature of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ.

original: gal te shing gcig nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te shing gcig nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt a tree just one thing?

original: shing gang yin pa de sha pa'i bdag nyid can yin na sha pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i shing nyid gzhan gang zhig yin /üîΩrang gi mtshan nyid la ni shing la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can 'ga' zhig ni gzhan gyi bdag nyid can ma yin la /
analyzed: shing gang yin pa de sha pa'i bdag nyid can yin na sha pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i shing nyid gzhan gang zhig yin / rang gi mtshan nyid la ni shing la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can 'ga' zhig ni gzhan gyi bdag nyid can ma yin la /
translated: If a tree is by nature a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ, then what other tree is there that is not by nature a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ?üîΩIn its own nature, a tree is not by nature anything else, such as a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ.

original: 'ga' zhig ni gzhan gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni gzhan gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And in its own nature, a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ is not by nature anything else, such as a tree.

original: de la chos rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la chos rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no division of a thing into parts.

original: gal te de lta na thams cad bdag nyid gcig pa yin yang de yongs su spangs nas yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir de'i bdag nyid 'khrul par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na thams cad bdag nyid gcig pa yin yang de yongs su spangs nas yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir de'i bdag nyid 'khrul par 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then even though everything is the same in being a thing, the error of identity would occur, because the nature of one would be abandoned and the nature of another would exist.

original: des na sha pa yang shing gi bdag nyid can yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na sha pa yang shing gi bdag nyid can yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ would be by nature a tree.

original: gal te dngos po la de'i chos rjes su 'gro ba'am chos rnam par dbye ba 'ga' yang med do zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te dngos po la de'i chos rjes su 'gro ba'am chos rnam par dbye ba 'ga' yang med do zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it explained that a thing does not have a property that follows it or any division of properties?

original: rnam par dbye ba yod na shing gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba yod na shing gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is a difference, then there would be two trees.

original: rnam par dbye ba med na yang de'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa'i chos can gzhan la yod pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid la nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med na yang de'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa'i chos can gzhan la yod pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid la nges pa nyid do //
translated: If there is no difference, then the nature of one would be the nature of the other, and there would be no certainty of identity.

original: don gzhan la yod pa'i @18b shing nyid dang sha pa nyid ni gzhan nyid yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan la yod pa'i @18b shing nyid dang sha pa nyid ni gzhan nyid yin no //
translated: The nature of a tree and the nature of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ that exist in different objects are different.

original: des na ji ltar shing yin yang seng ldeng du gyur pa de bzhin du sha pa yang shing ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na ji ltar shing yin yang seng ldeng du gyur pa de bzhin du sha pa yang shing ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, just as it is a tree and it is a khadira, in the same way it is a tree and it is a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ.

original: 'di la brjod pa shing zhes bya ba ni lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa la brjod de /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa shing zhes bya ba ni lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa la brjod de /
translated: Here it is said: A tree is said to be endowed with leaves and so on.

original: des na 'di sed ldeng la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'di sed ldeng la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is a khadira.

original: sha pa zhes bya ba ni lo ma la sogs pa'i khyad par de ji ltar shing ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sha pa zhes bya ba ni lo ma la sogs pa'i khyad par de ji ltar shing ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: A ≈õim≈õapƒÅ is said to be endowed with leaves and so on. How could it not be a tree?

original: de bzhin du byas pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i ngang can gyi rgyu'i dngos po'i chos yin pas de yang ji ltar 'jig pa'i ngang can ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i ngang can gyi rgyu'i dngos po'i chos yin pas de yang ji ltar 'jig pa'i ngang can ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: So too, that which is called ‚Äúproduced‚Äù is a quality of a thing that is the cause of destruction, so how could it not be subject to destruction?

original: de ltar yang ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is also explained in the same way.

original: ring po nyid dang sha pa nyid dag ni phan tshun bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ring po nyid dang sha pa nyid dag ni phan tshun bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: Longness and shortness are not mutually established.

original: des nag zhig gang gi bdag nyid can yin pa de de la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir chos kyi bdag nyid de'i bdag nyid yin par 'brel pa rigs pa dag sems so //
analyzed: des nag zhig gang gi bdag nyid can yin pa de de la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir chos kyi bdag nyid de'i bdag nyid yin par 'brel pa rigs pa dag sems so //
translated: Therefore, since that which is long is not mistaken with respect to that, it is reasonable to think that the nature of a quality is the nature of that.

original: yang ji ltar na 'ga' zhig gi rang bzhin yin zhes rtogs she na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na 'ga' zhig gi rang bzhin yin zhes rtogs she na /
translated: Again, how is it understood that it is the intrinsic reality of some?

original: 'di ni mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: gal te go bar byed pa gcig gi bdag nyid yin na de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te go bar byed pa gcig gi bdag nyid yin na de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is the intrinsic reality of a single thing that is understood, then that which is established would be that which is to be established.

original: sha pa'i rang bzhin shing nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin du byas pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de ltar ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sha pa'i rang bzhin shing nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin du byas pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de ltar ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that a tree is the essence of a post, or that an impermanent entity is the essence of a product,

original: sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the proof and the probandum are mutually exclusive.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni grub pa yin la bsgrub par bya ba ni de las bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni grub pa yin la bsgrub par bya ba ni de las bzlog pa yin te /
translated: The essence of the proof is established, and the probandum is the opposite of that.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dag bdag nyid gcig par 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dag bdag nyid gcig par 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that the proof and the probandum are identical.

original: 'di nyid smras pa ni gal te de'i bdag nyid yin na byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid smras pa ni gal te de'i bdag nyid yin na byed pa'o //
translated: This is what is said: If it is of the nature of that, it is the proof.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni go bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni go bar bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the object of understanding.

original: gang la de'i bdag nyid yod pa de la de skad brjod de de yang go bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang la de'i bdag nyid yod pa de la de skad brjod de de yang go bar byed pa'o //
translated: That which has the nature of that is called that, and that is the object of understanding.

original: de'i dngos po nyid de de yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa bye brag med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i dngos po nyid de de yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa bye brag med do zhe na /
translated: If it is the nature of that, then there is no difference between the probandum and the proof.

original: dogs pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos te byas pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi bye brag kun brtags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dogs pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos te byas pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi bye brag kun brtags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is stated because the distinctions of the qualities of the produced, impermanent, etc. are imagined.

original: rtogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i byed par rig pa ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i byed par rig pa ste /
translated: Realization is the activity of conceptualization.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason is because of that.

original: rnam par rtog pa sa chos tha dad pa rig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa sa chos tha dad pa rig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the distinctions of the qualities are known by conceptualization.

original: gal te byas pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa de lta na /
analyzed: gal te byas pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa de lta na /
translated: If the produced has the nature of the impermanent,

original: rnam par rtog pas de dag tha dad par rig pa de'i phyir byas pa'i bdag nyid de @19a * //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas de dag tha dad par rig pa de'i phyir byas pa'i bdag nyid de @19a * //
translated: then because of that, the distinctions of those are known by conceptualization.

original: zhes ma rtogs pa dag byas pa grub kyang mi rtag pa mi rigs pa'i phyir grub pa dang ma grub pa sgrub pa dang bsgrub bya'i bye brag rjes su mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes ma rtogs pa dag byas pa grub kyang mi rtag pa mi rigs pa'i phyir grub pa dang ma grub pa sgrub pa dang bsgrub bya'i bye brag rjes su mthun pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the distinction between the established and the unestablished is in accordance with the established and the unestablished.

original: 'di yang phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: 'dir 'dod nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'dod nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, this is not accepted.

original: slob dpon gyis kyang de ltar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis kyang de ltar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The master [NƒÅgƒÅrjuna] also accepts it in that way.

original: de skad du yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de skad du yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag pa'i tha snyad ni rtogs pa po'i de la brten pa'i byed pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag pa'i tha snyad ni rtogs pa po'i de la brten pa'i byed pa ste /
translated: Inference and the convention of inference are based on the understanding of the one who infers.

original: rjes su dpag pas rjes su dpag par bya ba rjes su dpog pa 'di thams cad ni blo la yod pa'i chos dang chos can gyi bye brag kho nas yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas rjes su dpag par bya ba rjes su dpog pa 'di thams cad ni blo la yod pa'i chos dang chos can gyi bye brag kho nas yin no //
translated: All of this‚Äîinferring the inferred object through inference‚Äîis only by means of the categories of subject and predicate that exist in the mind.

original: chos can 'di'i chos ni 'di yin no zhes de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi tshul gyis rjes su dpag pa 'jug la /
analyzed: chos can 'di'i chos ni 'di yin no zhes de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi tshul gyis rjes su dpag pa 'jug la /
translated: Inference operates by the mode of such a nature, thinking ‚ÄúThe property of this subject is this.‚Äù

original: de yang thams cad du blo la yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de yang thams cad du blo la yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: And that is only in the mind in all cases.

original: sgra dang sa phyogs chos can nyid dang byas pa dang du ba dag gam /
analyzed: sgra dang sa phyogs chos can nyid dang byas pa dang du ba dag gam /
translated: The subject, sound or a place, and the property, being produced or being smoky,

original: mi rtag pa dang me'i chos nyid blos byas pa kho na'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang me'i chos nyid blos byas pa kho na'o //
translated: or impermanence and the property of being a product of fire, are only mentally created.

original: chos dang chos can gyi dngos po ni 'di 'di'i yin no zhes 'brel pa rtogs pa las yin no //
analyzed: chos dang chos can gyi dngos po ni 'di 'di'i yin no zhes 'brel pa rtogs pa las yin no //
translated: The entities of the property and the basis of the property are due to the realization of the relation, this is the property of that.

original: de las tha dad pa rnams kyi ni 'brel pa nyid btags pa yin la tha mi dad pa la ni tha dad pa med par chos dang chos can gyi dngos po mi 'grub ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de las tha dad pa rnams kyi ni 'brel pa nyid btags pa yin la tha mi dad pa la ni tha dad pa med par chos dang chos can gyi dngos po mi 'grub ba'i phyir /
translated: The relation of those that are different is a mere designation, and in the case of nondifference, the entities of the property and the basis of the property are not established without difference.

original: de blo la yod pa zhes bya bas bye brag rtogs pas rtogs pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir shes par byed pa'i gzhung 'di'i yul ni chos tha dad par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de blo la yod pa zhes bya bas bye brag rtogs pas rtogs pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir shes par byed pa'i gzhung 'di'i yul ni chos tha dad par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Since it will be explained that the cognition of the difference is due to the cognition of the difference in the intellect, the domain of this text that establishes the difference is the realization of the difference of the property.

original: gal te byas pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin yang de las bzlog pa rtogs na /
analyzed: gal te byas pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin yang de las bzlog pa rtogs na /
translated: If the nature of the produced is impermanent, but it is realized as the opposite of that,üîΩthen, because it is different from that, it is not truly existent by nature, like the two moons.

original: 'o na ni de las tha dad pa'i phyir de lta bu bden pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pas zla ba gnyis bzhin du de sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i dogs pa 'di bsu nas chos dang chos can nyid du zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'o na ni de las tha dad pa'i phyir de lta bu bden pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pas zla ba gnyis bzhin du de sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i dogs pa 'di bsu nas chos dang chos can nyid du zhes smos so //
translated: In response to this doubt, the text says, ‚Äúas the property and the basis of the property,‚Äù

original: chos dang chos can nyid du tha dad pa blo'i rnam pas byas te /
analyzed: chos dang chos can nyid du tha dad pa blo'i rnam pas byas te /
translated: The difference between the property and the property-possessor is created by the mind.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blos mi bden par rtog pa yin gyi mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don kyang ni ma yin te /
