translated: When one doubts that the nature of the visible or invisible is multiple, one refutes the experience of a single nature by saying, ‚ÄúIt is not multiple.‚Äù

original: des na 'di ltar rung ba 'gog pa la bltar rung ba nyid ni yan lag ma yin na /
analyzed: des na 'di ltar rung ba 'gog pa la bltar rung ba nyid ni yan lag ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the visible is not a part of the refutation of the invisible,

original: de ji ltar bltar mi rung ba ni bltar mi rung ba nyid kyi phyir bkag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ji ltar bltar mi rung ba ni bltar mi rung ba nyid kyi phyir bkag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'gyur /
translated: how could the invisible be refuted because of its invisibility?

original: bltar rung ba la ni bltar mi rung ba'i bdag nyid med pa'i phyir bltar rung bar khas blangs nas 'gog @36b go zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni skra bregs zin nas skar ma rtogs pa dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: bltar rung ba la ni bltar mi rung ba'i bdag nyid med pa'i phyir bltar rung bar khas blangs nas 'gog @36b go zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni skra bregs zin nas skar ma rtogs pa dang mtshungs so //
translated: Since the visible does not have an invisible nature, it is refuted by accepting the visible. This is like shaving one‚Äôs head and then looking for the stars.

original: gal te 'di la yang 'ga' zhig rmongs nas 'gal ba gcig nyid bltar rung ba'i dmigs pas bltar mi rung ba de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: gal te 'di la yang 'ga' zhig rmongs nas 'gal ba gcig nyid bltar rung ba'i dmigs pas bltar mi rung ba de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: If someone is confused about this, he might think that the very same contradiction is not contradictory because the object that is suitable to be seen by perception is refuted as having the nature of that which is not suitable to be seen by perception.

original: de ni shes pa rang bzhin gzhan du dogs pa na yang 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni shes pa rang bzhin gzhan du dogs pa na yang 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: That is also the case when there is doubt about the nature of consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sa phyogs dmigs kyang bum pa med par the tshom za bar ma yin pa na mngon sum nyid kyis de med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sa phyogs dmigs kyang bum pa med par the tshom za bar ma yin pa na mngon sum nyid kyis de med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, when the place is observed, it is not that there is doubt about the nonexistence of the pot, and so by perception itself, the convention of its nonexistence would occur.

original: de lta ma yin na shes pa yang gzhan rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na shes pa yang gzhan rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were not so, then consciousness would not be confused about something else.

original: des na de ltar dngos po gzhan nyid du rnam par gnas pa nyid du nye bar mkho ba'i dgos pa can dngos po med pa bsgrub ba'i phyir de dmigs pas dgag pa'i don rtogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis byas pa yang de tsam gyis yul gyi
analyzed: des na de ltar dngos po gzhan nyid du rnam par gnas pa nyid du nye bar mkho ba'i dgos pa can dngos po med pa bsgrub ba'i phyir de dmigs pas dgag pa'i don rtogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis byas pa yang de tsam gyis yul gyi
translated: Therefore, in that way, the purpose of the requirement of the establishment of the difference of entities is for the sake of establishing the nonexistence of entities. The object of negation is understood by the object of the negation that is the opposite of the mode of apprehension explained above.

original: mthar thug pa de'i tha snyad kyi rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: mthar thug pa de'i tha snyad kyi rang bzhin yin no //
translated: The ultimate nature of that is the nature of the non-apprehension.

original: gal te de yang rtogs pa tsam gyi rang bzhin skye ba na yul dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi mthar thug pa ma yin yang gdon mi za bar bya ba ni de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te de yang rtogs pa tsam gyi rang bzhin skye ba na yul dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi mthar thug pa ma yin yang gdon mi za bar bya ba ni de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid byed pa yin no //
translated: If that is also the nature of mere apprehension, when it arises, it is not the ultimate nature of the other, because it does not have an object. But it is the nature of the activity that is necessarily so.

original: des na gzhan dmigs pa na mi dmigs pa mngon sum gyis grub pa yin la gzhan yod pa na yang med pa mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no ;
analyzed: des na gzhan dmigs pa na mi dmigs pa mngon sum gyis grub pa yin la gzhan yod pa na yang med pa mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no ;
translated: Therefore, when the other is apprehended, the non-apprehension is established by perception. And when the other exists, the non-existence is also established by perception.

original: / de lta na dngos po med pa sgrub byed la ltos pa bsal nas rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa can nyid mi dmigs pa'i byed pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir gang gi tshe zhes smos so //
analyzed: / de lta na dngos po med pa sgrub byed la ltos pa bsal nas rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa can nyid mi dmigs pa'i byed pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir gang gi tshe zhes smos so //
translated: Thus, having eliminated the reliance on a proof of non-existence, it is shown that the activity of non-apprehension has the ultimate nature of apprehension. Therefore, it says, ‚ÄúWhen . . .‚Äù

original: 'dir yang gnyis dag gnyis nyid du rnam par 'ngog pa na mngon sum nyid kyis tha snyad byed pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa don med do //
analyzed: 'dir yang gnyis dag gnyis nyid du rnam par 'ngog pa na mngon sum nyid kyis tha snyad byed pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa don med do //
translated: Here also, when the two are distinguished as two, because the designation is by perception, the non-apprehension is meaningless.

original: de bzhin du dngos po gzhan rnam par gnas pa'i gzhi can dngos po med par rtogs pa ni gzhan gyi dngos po'i mthar thug pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po gzhan rnam par gnas pa'i gzhi can dngos po med par rtogs pa ni gzhan gyi dngos po'i mthar thug pa nyid yin te /
translated: Likewise, the realization of the nonexistence of other things that are based on a basis that is a thing is the ultimate of other things.

original: des na gal te rmongs pas de la de ltar mi 'jug pa la mi dmigs pa gtan tshigs yin pa de'i phyir gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid can yod pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gal te rmongs pas de la de ltar mi 'jug pa la mi dmigs pa gtan tshigs yin pa de'i phyir gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid can yod pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if nonapprehension is the reason for not engaging in that way due to confusion, then the existence that has the nature of the existence of other would be the object to be established.

original: de ni 'di ltar bzlog ste /üîΩgang gi tshe med pa dag gi med pa mi dmigs pa kho na yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar bzlog ste / gang gi tshe med pa dag gi med pa mi dmigs pa kho na yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: This is refuted as follows:üîΩWhen nonexistence is only the nonapprehension of nonexistence,

original: med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul grub pa kho na ste /
analyzed: med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul grub pa kho na ste /
translated: then the object that has the characteristic of nonexistence is established.

original: mi dmigs pa nyid med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on kyang med pa'i @37a * //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa nyid med pa yin pa'i phyir ro // 'on kyang med pa'i @37a * //
translated: This is because nonapprehension itself is nonexistence.

original: mtshan nyid kyi yul grub tu zin kyang med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad dag khong du ma chud pa 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi yul grub tu zin kyang med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad dag khong du ma chud pa 'jug par byed do //
translated: However, even though the object that has the characteristic of nonexistence is established, those who do not understand the cognition, word, and convention of nonexistence are caused to engage in it.

original: gang khong du ma chud pa de nyid rtogs pa la 'jug par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang khong du ma chud pa de nyid rtogs pa la 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is that which causes one to enter into the realization of that very non-apprehension.

original: gang gis she na yul rab tu bstan pas zhes smos so //
analyzed: gang gis she na yul rab tu bstan pas zhes smos so //
translated: By what? It is said: ‚Äúby the demonstration of the object.‚Äù

original: yul ni mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: yul ni mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po med pa ste /
translated: The object is the non-existence that has the nature of non-apprehension.

original: de rab tu bstan pas med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de rab tu bstan pas med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: By the demonstration of that, the knowledge, word, and expression of non-existence are established.

original: de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa don med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa don med pa ma yin no //
translated: For the sake of establishing that, non-apprehension is not meaningless.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i dngos po med pa yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i dngos po med pa yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the non-existence as explained to be established,

original: de ni mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyis grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyis grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is already established by the nature of non-apprehension.

original: gal te mngon sum gyis gzhan yod pas med pa grub na med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad khong du ma chud par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gyis gzhan yod pas med pa grub na med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dang tha snyad khong du ma chud par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If non-existence is established by the existence of another through direct perception, how could the knowledge, word, and expression of non-existence be incomprehensible?

original: rmongs pas zhes smos so //
analyzed: rmongs pas zhes smos so //
translated: It is said: ‚Äúdue to delusion.‚Äù

original: rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las gzhan yod pa la yang med par khong du ma chud pa de ltar khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las gzhan yod pa la yang med par khong du ma chud pa de ltar khong du chud par byed do //
translated: In the same way, one should understand that non-apprehension is the apprehension of the non-existence of something that exists.

original: gal te don gzhan yod pa dngos po'i ngo bo med par bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te don gzhan yod pa dngos po'i ngo bo med par bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But, it was said that the existence of another object is to be established as the nature of a non-entity.

original: gang gis de grub na dngos po med pa grub par brjod pa de ni mi dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis de grub na dngos po med pa grub par brjod pa de ni mi dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If it is asked by what means that is established, it is not non-apprehension that is said to establish non-existence.

original: dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin shes pa gzhan yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdes na shes pa gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid mi dmigs pas dngos po gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi med pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhe na rnam pa de lta bu'i zhes smos te /
analyzed: dmigs pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin shes pa gzhan yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro // des na shes pa gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid mi dmigs pas dngos po gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi med pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhe na rnam pa de lta bu'i zhes smos te /
translated: Because the nature of the non-existence of an object is the knowledge of another, which is the nature of non-apprehension.üîΩTherefore, non-apprehension, which has the nature of the existence of another knowledge, does not establish the non-existence that has the nature of the existence of another object.

original: gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid can no ;
analyzed: gzhan yod pa'i bdag nyid can no ;
translated: In response to that, it is said, ‚Äúin that way.‚Äù

original: / gzhan yod pa yang mi dmigs pa nyid de /
analyzed: / gzhan yod pa yang mi dmigs pa nyid de /
translated: The existence of another is also non-apprehension.

original: de gzhan med pa yin pa bzhin du dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gzhan med pa yin pa bzhin du dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as it is not different from that, so too it is not different from the nature of the non-observation of the object.

original: des na don 'di yin te dngos po med pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshad ma med pa can yin la dngos po dngos po med pa yang dngos po gzhan yod pa yin no ;
analyzed: des na don 'di yin te dngos po med pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshad ma med pa can yin la dngos po dngos po med pa yang dngos po gzhan yod pa yin no ;
translated: Thus, this is the meaning: The non-existence of a thing is the non-existence of the valid cognition of non-observation, and the non-existence of a thing is the existence of another thing.

original: / yod pa gang zhig dngos po dngos po med pa yin pa de ni dmigs pa dngos po med pa yang yin no //
analyzed: / yod pa gang zhig dngos po dngos po med pa yin pa de ni dmigs pa dngos po med pa yang yin no //
translated: That which exists and is the non-existence of a thing is also the non-existence of the observed object.

original: shes pa gzhan yod pa dmigs pa dngos po med pa gang yin pa de yang dngos po dngos po med pa yang yin no //
analyzed: shes pa gzhan yod pa dmigs pa dngos po med pa gang yin pa de yang dngos po dngos po med pa yang yin no //
translated: That which is the non-existence of the observed object, which is the existence of another consciousness, is also the non-existence of a thing.

original: de'i phyir dngos po dngos po med pa sgrub pa la mi @37b dmigs pa grub pa la ltos pa'i shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid de grub pa nyid na grub pa'i dngos po med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po dngos po med pa sgrub pa la mi @37b dmigs pa grub pa la ltos pa'i shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid de grub pa nyid na grub pa'i dngos po med pa ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in the proof of the non-existence of a thing, non-observation depends on the establishment of the object and consciousness, but when they are established, the non-existence of an established thing is not to be established.

original: de bas na gzhan yod pa de rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gzhan yod pa de rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the existence of the other is just as it is in reality, conventionally.

original: rmongs pas der tha snyad mi byed pa ni yod pa mi dmigs par mi srid pa'i phyir dmigs su rung ba med par nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas dngos po med par nges pa'i mi dmigs pas 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: rmongs pas der tha snyad mi byed pa ni yod pa mi dmigs par mi srid pa'i phyir dmigs su rung ba med par nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas dngos po med par nges pa'i mi dmigs pas 'jug par byed do //
translated: The ignorant do not make that conventional usage, but it is impossible not to observe the existence of the non-observation of the object of negation. Therefore, one engages in the non-observation that ascertains the absence of an object by subsuming the object that is suitable to be observed.

original: gzhan gyi dngos po yod pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po med pa ni mi dmigs pa grub pa nyid na grub pa'i phyir med do zhes bya bar rtogs pa ni rtogs zin pa nyid rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dngos po yod pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po med pa ni mi dmigs pa grub pa nyid na grub pa'i phyir med do zhes bya bar rtogs pa ni rtogs zin pa nyid rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The absence of an entity that is the nature of the existence of the other is established by the establishment of the non-observation. Therefore, the realization of ‚Äúit does not exist‚Äù is the realization of what has already been realized.

original: des na dngos po lhag pa grub pa med pa'i phyir dang / rtogs pa 'di sngar gyi de rtogs pa dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir de tsam nyid grub par 'gyur pas tha snyad bsgrub par brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: des na dngos po lhag pa grub pa med pa'i phyir dang / rtogs pa 'di sngar gyi de rtogs pa dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir de tsam nyid grub par 'gyur pas tha snyad bsgrub par brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, because there is no establishment of an additional entity and because this realization is not the same as the previous realization, just that is established. Thus, it is said that the conventional is established.

original: tha snyad dang med na mi 'byung ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad dang med na mi 'byung ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other conventional usage that is invariably concomitant with existence.

original: tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs thams cad la khyab pa sgrub pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs thams cad la khyab pa sgrub pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid yin no //
translated: This is the way to establish the pervasion in all syllogisms that prove a nominal existent.

original: gtan tshigs gang gis de sgrub pa de ni tha snyad du bya ba'i don dang / med na mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid des rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gang gis de sgrub pa de ni tha snyad du bya ba'i don dang / med na mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid des rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: Because the reason that proves that is the meaning of the expression and is a reason that is a necessary concomitant, it is that itself that is to be understood.

original: rtogs par bya ba de yang lhag pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang ; lhag pa yin yang grub zin pa'i phyir grub pa la ma ltos pas de'i rtogs pa tsam nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba de yang lhag pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang ; lhag pa yin yang grub zin pa'i phyir grub pa la ma ltos pas de'i rtogs pa tsam nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: And because that which is to be understood is not in excess and because even if it were in excess it would already be established, it is established by the mere understanding of it without relying on establishment.

original: dper na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid las 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir de grub na grub pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid las 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir de grub na grub pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the establishment of the effect itself when it is established by the mere performance of the forward and reverse pervasion, because the effect is not different from that.

original: de yod pa nyid kyis de de ltar bsgrub par bya ba na dngos su tshul snga mas kyang rtogs zin pa'i rtogs pa po'i rtogs pa mi 'dra ba'i spyod yul gyi dngos por yang dag pa'i 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: de yod pa nyid kyis de de ltar bsgrub par bya ba na dngos su tshul snga mas kyang rtogs zin pa'i rtogs pa po'i rtogs pa mi 'dra ba'i spyod yul gyi dngos por yang dag pa'i 'jog pa yin no //
translated: And when that is established, the thing that is the object of the cognition of the cognizer, who has already understood it by the former method, is correctly posited as the thing that is the object of a different cognition.

original: de bzhin du shing nyid sha pa las gzhan yin yang byas pa grub pas mi rtag pa grub pa ltar sha pa grub na grub pa las 'da' ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du shing nyid sha pa las gzhan yin yang byas pa grub pas mi rtag pa grub pa ltar sha pa grub na grub pa las 'da' ba ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, although treehood is different from oakhood, impermanence is established by the establishment of product, and when oakhood is established, it is not that product is not established.

original: de'i phyir sha pa nyid ni shing gi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir des de sgrub pa na de yang grub zin pa'i phyir shing ngo zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa can grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sha pa nyid ni shing gi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir des de sgrub pa na de yang grub zin pa'i phyir shing ngo zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa can grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, since oakhood is the nature of tree, when it establishes that, it also establishes that, and so the final establishment of the tree is established.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang gzhan yod pa nyid dngos po med pa sgro btags pa'i tha snyad du bya ba yin @38a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang gzhan yod pa nyid dngos po med pa sgro btags pa'i tha snyad du bya ba yin @38a * //
translated: In the same way, here also, the existence of another is a superimposition of nonexistence, and it is a verbal designation.

original: pa'i phyir de grub pa nyid na dngos po med par sgro 'dogs par byed pa'i rtogs pa 'jug pas rtogs pa nyid bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: pa'i phyir de grub pa nyid na dngos po med par sgro 'dogs par byed pa'i rtogs pa 'jug pas rtogs pa nyid bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Therefore, when it is established, the cognition that superimposes non-existence is engaged, so the establishment of the cognition itself is the result.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: For that very reason, this is a natural inference,

original: mi dmigs pa dang don med pa gnyis tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa dang don med pa gnyis tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because non-apprehension and non-existence are not different.

original: gal te gzhan yod pa ni gzhan dngos po med pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang bltar rung ba'i bum pas rnam par bcad pa'i phyogs las gzhan du grub pas phyogs dag pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te gzhan yod pa ni gzhan dngos po med pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang bltar rung ba'i bum pas rnam par bcad pa'i phyogs las gzhan du grub pas phyogs dag pa yin no //
translated: If the existence of another is not the non-existence of another, but rather the establishment of another in a place distinguished from the visible pot, then that place is pure.

original: gal te 'di ma dmigs pa yang yod par rtogs pa'i phyir bum pa dang bcas pa las gzhan du ma rtogs na de nyid rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'di ma dmigs pa yang yod par rtogs pa'i phyir bum pa dang bcas pa las gzhan du ma rtogs na de nyid rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: If this non-apprehension is also apprehended as existent, and is not apprehended as different from the pot, then that itself is to be apprehended.

original: des na gzhan gyi tha snyad nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gzhan gyi tha snyad nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the mere convention of another would be established.

original: 'on te dngos po la de ltar yin yang dgag pa'i don sgro ma btags par gsal bar rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir med pa'i tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po la de ltar yin yang dgag pa'i don sgro ma btags par gsal bar rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir med pa'i tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But even if things exist in that way, since the meaning of negation is not clearly understood without superimposition, the expression of nonexistence is established as the object of affirmation.

original: de lta na yang gzhan yod pa dngos po med pa yin no zhes rtogs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa 'dis ci bya /
analyzed: de lta na yang gzhan yod pa dngos po med pa yin no zhes rtogs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa 'dis ci bya /
translated: If that is so, then what is the use of this cognition that does not possess the realization that the existence of another is a nonthing?

original: bltar rung ba'i dngos po yod pa la shes pa 'khrul pa med pa las ma mthong ba'i phyir med do zhes bya ba rtogs pas 'jug pa nyid de tsam gyis mthar thug pa can gyi sgrub pa can gyi sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bltar rung ba'i dngos po yod pa la shes pa 'khrul pa med pa las ma mthong ba'i phyir med do zhes bya ba rtogs pas 'jug pa nyid de tsam gyis mthar thug pa can gyi sgrub pa can gyi sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is just this much that is the final point of engagement, since the existence of a visible thing is understood to be nonexistent due to the nonseeing of an error-free consciousness, then that would be a proof that is established by a mere proof.

original: brjod pa rtogs pa 'di ni rang gi dmigs pa mngon du byed pa'i don gzhan mthong bas bdag nyid la brten pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: brjod pa rtogs pa 'di ni rang gi dmigs pa mngon du byed pa'i don gzhan mthong bas bdag nyid la brten pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: We reply: This cognition does not depend on itself, since it sees another object that is the opposite of its focal object.

original: 'on kyang dngos po gzhan nyid rnam par dpyod pa nyid kyis yin pa de'i phyir de nyid der sgro btags pa rtogs pa yin par bstan te /
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po gzhan nyid rnam par dpyod pa nyid kyis yin pa de'i phyir de nyid der sgro btags pa rtogs pa yin par bstan te /
translated: However, since the existence of another entity is analyzed, it is shown that the imputation of that very thing is understood.

original: tshad ma'i yul la dgag pa'i don ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma'i yul la dgag pa'i don ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of negation does not enter into the domain of valid knowledge.

original: de dang de'i yul gyi lhas sbyin la bya ba sgro btags pas rtogs pa bzhin tha mi dad pa la yang tha dad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang de'i yul gyi lhas sbyin la bya ba sgro btags pas rtogs pa bzhin tha mi dad pa la yang tha dad pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as Devadatta is understood through the imputation of action in regard to his object, so it is with regard to that which is not different.

original: des na ji ltar lhas byin 'gro ba la bya ba gzhan ma rtogs kyang bya ba'i rtogs pa gnod pa med pa de bzhin du 'di na bum pa med do zhes dgag pa'i don la lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can du ba las me
analyzed: des na ji ltar lhas byin 'gro ba la bya ba gzhan ma rtogs kyang bya ba'i rtogs pa gnod pa med pa de bzhin du 'di na bum pa med do zhes dgag pa'i don la lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can du ba las me
translated: Therefore, just as when Devadatta walks, although another action is not understood, the understanding of action is not undermined, so too, when it is said, ‚ÄúThe pot does not exist here,‚Äù the cognition of the object of negation is not hidden.

original: rtogs pa bzhin du dgag pa'i don lhag par rtogs pa med kyang gnod pa med pa ni gzhan yod pa nyid kyis 'byor par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshad ma'i yul la brjod par 'dod pa'i dgag pa'i don ni gzhan yod pa'i mthar @38b thug pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtogs pa bzhin du dgag pa'i don lhag par rtogs pa med kyang gnod pa med pa ni gzhan yod pa nyid kyis 'byor par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshad ma'i yul la brjod par 'dod pa'i dgag pa'i don ni gzhan yod pa'i mthar @38b thug pa nyid do //
translated: Although there is no understanding of the meaning of negation as it is understood, there is no fault, because it is included in the existence of another. Therefore, the meaning of negation, which is the object of valid cognition and is intended to be expressed, is included in the existence of another.

original: des na rtogs pa po'i rtogs pa la ltos te gzhan yod pa dngos po dngos po med par brjod do //
analyzed: des na rtogs pa po'i rtogs pa la ltos te gzhan yod pa dngos po dngos po med par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, in relation to the understanding of the one who understands, the existence of another is called a non-entity.

original: dngos po gzhan gyi bskyed pa dang / dngos po gzhan gyi mthar thug pa ni chos gzhan sgro 'dogs pa'i sgo nas de la dmigs pa nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no zhes bya bar 'thad do //
analyzed: dngos po gzhan gyi bskyed pa dang / dngos po gzhan gyi mthar thug pa ni chos gzhan sgro 'dogs pa'i sgo nas de la dmigs pa nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no zhes bya bar 'thad do //
translated: The production of another entity and the culmination of another entity are tenable as engaging by means of observing that through superimposing another phenomenon.

original: de ltar 'di ni nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar 'di ni nges pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, this is certain.

original: 'di brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be stated:

original: shes pa gzhan yod pa nyid shes pa dngos po med pa yin pa ltar dngos po gzhan yod pa yang shes pa dngos po med pa yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan yod pa nyid shes pa dngos po med pa yin pa ltar dngos po gzhan yod pa yang shes pa dngos po med pa yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Just as the existence of another cognition is a non-entity of cognition, how can the existence of another entity also be a non-entity of cognition?

original: shes pa gzhan yod pa shes pa dngos po med pa yin pa ji lta ba de ltar dngos po gzhan yod pa yang ngo //
analyzed: shes pa gzhan yod pa shes pa dngos po med pa yin pa ji lta ba de ltar dngos po gzhan yod pa yang ngo //
translated: Just as the cognition of the existence of another cognition is the non-existence of a thing, so it is with the existence of another thing.

original: mi mthun pa'i zla ba'i dngos po gzhan ni rang yod na gzhan yod pa sel bas dngos po gzhan dngos po med par brjod do //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i zla ba'i dngos po gzhan ni rang yod na gzhan yod pa sel bas dngos po gzhan dngos po med par brjod do //
translated: The existence of another thing that is incompatible with it is the non-existence of a thing, since when it exists, the other does not exist.

original: des na ji ltar phyogs 'ba' zhig gi shes pa bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa dang 'gal ba des na shes pa de la med par 'dod pa de bzhin du phyogs tsam yod pa yang bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa dang 'gal ba yin
analyzed: des na ji ltar phyogs 'ba' zhig gi shes pa bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa dang 'gal ba des na shes pa de la med par 'dod pa de bzhin du phyogs tsam yod pa yang bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa dang 'gal ba yin
translated: Therefore, just as the cognition of a place that is not isolated from a pot is incompatible with the cognition of a place that is isolated from a pot, and thus the former is asserted to be non-existent in the latter, so too the cognition of a place that is not isolated from a pot is incompatible with the cognition of a place that is isolated from a pot.

original: no // 'khrul pa med pa ni phyogs tsam la yang bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su snang ba mi 'thad do //
analyzed: no // 'khrul pa med pa ni phyogs tsam la yang bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su snang ba mi 'thad do //
translated: The non-erroneous cognition of a place that is not isolated from a pot does not cognize a place that is isolated from a pot.

original: des na phyogs tsam gyi shes pa bzhin phyogs tsam yang bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs kyi shes pa dngos po med pa yin no //
analyzed: des na phyogs tsam gyi shes pa bzhin phyogs tsam yang bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs kyi shes pa dngos po med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as the cognition of a place that is not isolated from a pot is incompatible with the cognition of a place that is isolated from a pot, so too the place that is not isolated from a pot is incompatible with the place that is isolated from a pot.

original: des na ji ltar de tsam shes pa na gal te bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa yod na de bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ba zhig na de tsam du gsal ba yang gsal ba yin no zhes dngos po med par rtogs pa de bzhin du 'di
analyzed: des na ji ltar de tsam shes pa na gal te bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa yod na de bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ba zhig na de tsam du gsal ba yang gsal ba yin no zhes dngos po med par rtogs pa de bzhin du 'di
translated: Just as one understands the nonexistence of an entity by saying, ‚ÄúIt is not clear,‚Äù

original: la yang yin no //
analyzed: la yang yin no //
translated: so it is here.

original: gal te bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa yod na phyogs bum pa dang bcas pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na phyogs tsam yang snang ngo zhes so //
analyzed: gal te bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa yod na phyogs bum pa dang bcas pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na phyogs tsam yang snang ngo zhes so //
translated: If the cognition of the place together with the pot existed, the place together with the pot would appear. But the mere place appears.

original: des na shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid 'di ni mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid 'di ni mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the definition of cognition and the cognized is nonapprehension.

original: ji ltar shes bya'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs na dngos po med par 'grub pa de bzhin du shes pa'i mtshan nyid la yang yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar shes bya'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs na dngos po med par 'grub pa de bzhin du shes pa'i mtshan nyid la yang yin no //
translated: Just as the definition of the cognized is nonapprehended and established as nonexistent, so it is for the definition of cognition.

original: des na dngos po med pa yang shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: des na dngos po med pa yang shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the definition of cognition and the cognized is also nonexistence.

original: 'di ltar phyogs tsam bum pa dang bcas pa dang 'gal ba de @39a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs tsam bum pa dang bcas pa dang 'gal ba de @39a * //
translated: In the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.

original: bzhin du phyogs tsam gyi shes pa yang ngo //üîΩgang gi phyir bum pa yod kyang phyogs tsam shes par 'gyur ba srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzhin du phyogs tsam gyi shes pa yang ngo // gang gi phyir bum pa yod kyang phyogs tsam shes par 'gyur ba srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.

original: de'i phyir gal te phyogs 'di bum pa dang bcas pa yin na bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa gsal bar 'gyur ba zhig na phyogs tsam shes par gsal lo zhes bya bas kyang bum pa med par rtogs pa yin no //üîΩdes na shes pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa na yang bum pa med par grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te phyogs 'di bum pa dang bcas pa yin na bum pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs shes pa gsal bar 'gyur ba zhig na phyogs tsam shes par gsal lo zhes bya bas kyang bum pa med par rtogs pa yin no // des na shes pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa na yang bum pa med par grub bo //
translated: In the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.

original: de ltar rtogs par dka' ba'i mi dmigs pa de ni 'di kho na bzhin du rjes su rtogs par bya'o //üîΩde'i phyir med pa dag gi med pa rnam pa de lta bu'i mi dmigs pa kho na yin no zhes gsungs pa ni rigs par gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par dka' ba'i mi dmigs pa de ni 'di kho na bzhin du rjes su rtogs par bya'o //üîΩde'i phyir med pa dag gi med pa rnam pa de lta bu'i mi dmigs pa kho na yin no zhes gsungs pa ni rigs par gsungs so //
translated: In the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.üîΩIn the same way, the cognition of a part of the pot is incompatible with the cognition of the whole pot.

original: des na 'di ltar shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa /
analyzed: des na 'di ltar shes pa dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa /
translated: Therefore, the non-apprehension of the characteristics of consciousness and the object of consciousness,

original: dmigs pa dngos po med par rtogs pa de nyid ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis dngos po dngos po med pa nyid yin pas dngos po dngos po med pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa dngos po med par rtogs pa de nyid ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis dngos po dngos po med pa nyid yin pas dngos po dngos po med pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: the realization that the object of apprehension is unreal, is itself the realization of the realitylessness of things, since it is, as has been explained, the realitylessness of things.

original: de ltar dngos po med par lhag par rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po med par lhag par rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that one realizes things as unreal,

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa nyid skyes par zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa nyid skyes par zad do //
translated: but rather that the realization itself has arisen.

original: des na tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is the establishment of the conventional.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i mthar thug pa can sgrub pa'i byed pa la 'bras bu de tsam du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i mthar thug pa can sgrub pa'i byed pa la 'bras bu de tsam du 'gyur mod /
translated: If the establishment of the object of realization is the limit of the establishment of the object of realization, then the effect would be just that.

original: sgra dang tha snyad go ji ltar sgrub /
analyzed: sgra dang tha snyad go ji ltar sgrub /
translated: But how is the understanding of the term and the conventional established?

original: gang gis rtogs pa bzhin du 'di'i don sgrub pa med par rang gi yul nye bar gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur ba rang gi rgyu nges pa'i phyir rtogs pa bzhin du sgra yang do na la 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis rtogs pa bzhin du 'di'i don sgrub pa med par rang gi yul nye bar gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur ba rang gi rgyu nges pa'i phyir rtogs pa bzhin du sgra yang do na la 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But the meaning is not established without the realization, because the cause is ascertained in accordance with the realization. The sound is not the same as the meaning.

original: de'i phyir brda la zhes smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir brda la zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚Äúin the convention.‚Äù

original: brda yod na 'jug pa ni brda ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa'i sgra'am /
analyzed: brda yod na 'jug pa ni brda ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa'i sgra'am /
translated: When there is a convention, the engagement is the sound that is ascertained in accordance with the convention,

original: don sgrub pa nges par sbyor ba khas blangs pa zhugs par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: don sgrub pa nges par sbyor ba khas blangs pa zhugs par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: or the engagement is the application that is ascertained to establish the meaning.

original: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa'i don bdag gir byed pa'i mthar thug pa don la gzhol ba'i byed ba ni tha snyad do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa'i don bdag gir byed pa'i mthar thug pa don la gzhol ba'i byed ba ni tha snyad do //
translated: The ultimate activity that is directed toward the object is the convention that appropriates the object that accomplishes the desired result.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgra tsam don dam pa nyid du gyur pa'i dper /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgra tsam don dam pa nyid du gyur pa'i dper /
translated: Therefore, in the example of mere sound being ultimate,

original: dper na zhes smos so //
analyzed: dper na zhes smos so //
translated: it says, ‚Äúfor example.‚Äù

original: ba lang dang lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa ni don gcig pas sgra tsam gyis tha dad kyi ji ltar ngo bo dang ngo bo med pa nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir don yod pa dang gzhan med pa ltar don ni sgro btags pa @39b yang thaüîΩdad pa med do //
analyzed: ba lang dang lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa ni don gcig pas sgra tsam gyis tha dad kyi ji ltar ngo bo dang ngo bo med pa nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir don yod pa dang gzhan med pa ltar don ni sgro btags pa @39b yang tha dad pa med do //
translated: The collection of the ox, dewlap, etc. is the same object, so they are different only in name. But since they are different in nature and non-nature, just as an existent object is not another, the object is not different in designation.

original: de lta na yang 'thad pa 'di ni yul gyis yul can sgrub pa nyid la bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang 'thad pa 'di ni yul gyis yul can sgrub pa nyid la bstan pa yin no //
translated: However, this is tenable only if the object is established by the subject.üîΩThe meaning of negation in the manner stated is the final existence of another, so the one who understands it accepts that the object to be established is established in that way.

original: ji skad brjod pa'i tshul gyis dgag pa'i don ni gzhan yod pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir de la rtogs pa po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub par de ltar khas len pa ni brdar brjod do //
analyzed: ji skad brjod pa'i tshul gyis dgag pa'i don ni gzhan yod pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir de la rtogs pa po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub par de ltar khas len pa ni brdar brjod do //
translated: That is expressed by convention.

original: de la ni mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan dngos po med pa yul 'di bstan nas 'jug par byed de /
analyzed: de la ni mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan dngos po med pa yul 'di bstan nas 'jug par byed de /
translated: In that case, the non-apprehension characterized by the absence of another thing is taught as the object, and one engages in it.

original: lkog shal la sogs pa'i 'dus pa bstan nas ba lang zhes bya ba la 'jug pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa'i 'dus pa bstan nas ba lang zhes bya ba la 'jug pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as one engages in the so-called ox by pointing to the collection of the dewlap, etc.

original: 'dir ni ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa gal te yul tha mi dad pa'i phyir lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa'i shes pa tha mi dad pa de lta na yang sgra tsam tha dad pa nyid kyis dpe yin te snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa gal te yul tha mi dad pa'i phyir lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa'i shes pa tha mi dad pa de lta na yang sgra tsam tha dad pa nyid kyis dpe yin te snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Here, if the cognition ‚Äúox‚Äù is not different from the cognition of the collection of the dewlap, etc., because of the non-difference of the object, still, the example is just different in sound, as before.

original: yang na gang gi phyir lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa la yang ba lang ngo zhes rtogs te ba lang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub pa nyid du khong du chud nas 'jug gi lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa tsam rtogs pas ni ma yin
analyzed: yang na gang gi phyir lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa la yang ba lang ngo zhes rtogs te ba lang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub pa nyid du khong du chud nas 'jug gi lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa tsam rtogs pas ni ma yin
translated: Or, because of the cognition ‚Äúox‚Äù in the collection of the dewlap, etc., one understands the establishment of the object to be established as an ox, and engages in it; but not by the cognition of the mere collection of the dewlap, etc.

original: te / dper na gzhan yod pa nyid la dngos po med pa zhes rtogs nas dben pa don du gnyer ba 'jug pa bzhin yin pa de'i phyir shes pa tha dad pa yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: te / dper na gzhan yod pa nyid la dngos po med pa zhes rtogs nas dben pa don du gnyer ba 'jug pa bzhin yin pa de'i phyir shes pa tha dad pa yod pa nyid do //
translated: For example, one who seeks solitude engages in it by understanding the absence of entity in the mere presence of another; therefore, there is the presence of different cognitions.

original: tshul 'dis ni shes pa dngos po med pa dngos po dngos po med pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin pa spong ba gang dag dpe ma grub par brjod pa de dag gi dpe ma grub par rgol ba de yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: tshul 'dis ni shes pa dngos po med pa dngos po dngos po med pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin pa spong ba gang dag dpe ma grub par brjod pa de dag gi dpe ma grub par rgol ba de yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also refutes the argument that the example is not established, which is the objection that the non-existence of consciousness is the proof of the non-existence of things.

original: des smos pa ni de lta yin dang zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des smos pa ni de lta yin dang zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin that case‚Äù refers to this.

original: gal te dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa gcig pu'i tshad ma can yin na gang gi der mi dmigs pa yod pa na dngos po med par rtogs pa nas gzhan du de ltar rtogs par byed pa /
analyzed: gal te dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa gcig pu'i tshad ma can yin na gang gi der mi dmigs pa yod pa na dngos po med par rtogs pa nas gzhan du de ltar rtogs par byed pa /
translated: If the non-existence of things were the valid cognition that has the non-observation of something as its nature, then when there is the non-observation of something, the understanding of the non-existence of things would occur only in that place, and not elsewhere.

original: gang du yang 'di tshad ma gzhan gyi spyod yul gyi ngo bor gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gang du yang 'di tshad ma gzhan gyi spyod yul gyi ngo bor gyur ba med do //
translated: But it is not the case that it is the domain of another valid cognition.

original: de lta yin dang 'di ni tshad ma gzhan nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang 'di ni tshad ma gzhan nyid do zhe na /
translated: If that were the case, then it would be another valid cognition.

original: gal te mi dmigs pa bzhin du mngon sum gyis kyang dngos po med pa ma rtogs na de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mi dmigs pa bzhin du mngon sum gyis kyang dngos po med pa ma rtogs na de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: If, like non-observation, direct perception also did not understand the non-existence of things, then that would be the case.

original: de lta yin dang tshad ma gzhan gyi yul nyid du srid pa'i phyir dpam  grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang tshad ma gzhan gyi yul nyid du srid pa'i phyir dpam  grub pa ma yin no //
translated: If that were so, then it would be possible for it to be the object of another valid cognition, and so it would not be established by valid cognition.

original: tshad ma gzhan gyi yul du smra bas kyang de'i yul can gyi rnam par shes pa ma bkag par ni rang dbang du dngos po dngos po med par rtogs par nus pa @40a * //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyi yul du smra bas kyang de'i yul can gyi rnam par shes pa ma bkag par ni rang dbang du dngos po dngos po med par rtogs par nus pa @40a * //
translated: Even those who maintain that the object of another valid cognition is the object of a valid cognition cannot, without refuting the consciousness that has that as its object, independently ascertain the existence or nonexistence of an entity.

original: ma yin te /üîΩtshad mas grub pa smra rnams kyi /
analyzed: ma yin te / tshad mas grub pa smra rnams kyi /
translated: This is because,üîΩas will be explained,

original: don gyis bzlog pa nyid las ma grub pa yin zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyis bzlog pa nyid las ma grub pa yin zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: the proponents of valid cognition are refuted by the mere reversal of their meaning.

original: shes pa yang de'i rnam par shes pa ma bkag par dgag par mi nus so //
analyzed: shes pa yang de'i rnam par shes pa ma bkag par dgag par mi nus so //
translated: And consciousness cannot be refuted without refuting the consciousness that has it as its object.

original: rnam par shes pa yod dam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yod dam /
translated: Is consciousness existent or nonexistent?

original: 'on te med ces shes par 'dod pa de'i gsal ba tshol ba nyid 'jug pa la rnam par shes pa snang ba med pa'i phyir med do zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on te med ces shes par 'dod pa de'i gsal ba tshol ba nyid 'jug pa la rnam par shes pa snang ba med pa'i phyir med do zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If you want to know, then the mere search for its manifestation is the engagement, because without the appearance of consciousness, it is said to be nonexistent.

original: des na der yang mi dmigs pa tshol ba na thug pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na der yang mi dmigs pa tshol ba na thug pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, when you search for the nonapprehension of that, there is an infinite regress,

original: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: just as was explained.

original: 'on te shes pa med pa mngon sum gyis grub na tshad ma gzhan gyi yul nyid bsal ba'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i yul nyid rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te shes pa med pa mngon sum gyis grub na tshad ma gzhan gyi yul nyid bsal ba'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i yul nyid rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
translated: But if the non-existence of consciousness is established by direct perception, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.

original: gal te mi dmigs pa bzhin du gzhan yod pas dngos po dngos po med par grub pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma gzhan gyi yul ma yin pa dang rjes su 'brel pa can dpe ma grub pa yod na /üîΩ'o na ni mi dmigs pa 'jug pa la mi ltos par 'gyur te mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te mi dmigs pa bzhin du gzhan yod pas dngos po dngos po med par grub pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma gzhan gyi yul ma yin pa dang rjes su 'brel pa can dpe ma grub pa yod na / 'o na ni mi dmigs pa 'jug pa la mi ltos par 'gyur te mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.

original: nges na nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa tsam sgrub par byed pa yin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nges na nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa tsam sgrub par byed pa yin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: If the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be understood.üîΩIf the non-existence of a thing is established by the existence of another thing, as in the case of non-apprehension, then the object of another valid cognition is eliminated, and so the object as explained should be

original: de lta yin dang dpe ma grub pa nyid de mngon sum gyi grub pa la yang ma rtogs pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang de med na yang gtan tshigs nye bar len pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang dpe ma grub pa nyid de mngon sum gyi grub pa la yang ma rtogs pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang de med na yang gtan tshigs nye bar len pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If that were so, then the example would not be established, because it is not tenable that there is non-apprehension of what is established by direct perception, and if that does not exist, then it is not tenable that the reason is accepted.

original: yul rtogs su zin kyang zhes smos so //
analyzed: yul rtogs su zin kyang zhes smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúEven though the object is realized,‚Äù

original: gal te gzhan yod pas dngos po med pa'i blor 'gyur ba de lta na yang gang dag de la yang dngos po med par ma rtogs pa 'ga' zhig yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te gzhan yod pas dngos po med pa'i blor 'gyur ba de lta na yang gang dag de la yang dngos po med par ma rtogs pa 'ga' zhig yod pa yin te /
translated: and if the mind is one that is non-existent due to the existence of another, then in that case, there are some who do not realize that it is non-existent.

original: ji ltar 'di ni blon po rnams kyi gtso bo yod pa skye bar sems pas 'o ma la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa'i zho med par ma rtogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di ni blon po rnams kyi gtso bo yod pa skye bar sems pas 'o ma la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa'i zho med par ma rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as the ministers think that the chief minister exists, they do not realize that the non-observation of curds, which is characterized by the observation of milk, is non-existent.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum nyid yin yang mi dmigs pa la ltos pa yod pa'i phyir gang las dpe ma grub par 'gyur ba de gcig pu ni sgrub byed du brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum nyid yin yang mi dmigs pa la ltos pa yod pa'i phyir gang las dpe ma grub par 'gyur ba de gcig pu ni sgrub byed du brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though it is direct perception, since it depends on non-observation, it is not said that it alone is the proof, from which the example would not be established.

original: shes pa la sogs pa dag ni dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa gnyis yod pa'i shes pa 'gog pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du khyad par med par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa la sogs pa dag ni dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa gnyis yod pa'i shes pa 'gog pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du khyad par med par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because consciousness and so on must have a prior object, the two non-apprehensions are said to be indistinguishable in that they both have the effect of negating consciousness.

original: de 'dir gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir de ltar zhes smos so //
analyzed: de 'dir gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir de ltar zhes smos so //
translated: Here, in order to establish the treatise, he says ‚Äúthus.‚Äù

original: tshul 'dis ni mi dmigs pa 'di gnyis ni yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du 'dra'o //
analyzed: tshul 'dis ni mi dmigs pa 'di gnyis ni yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du 'dra'o //
translated: By this method, these two non-apprehensions are similar in that they both have the effect of negating the designation of existence.

original: myong ba'i rang @40b bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'ga' yang yod par mi srid do //
analyzed: myong ba'i rang @40b bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'ga' yang yod par mi srid do //
translated: It is not possible for any consciousness to exist that is not of the nature of experience.

original: des na 'ga' zhig myong bzhin pa'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa gnyis su brjod pa 'thob bo //
analyzed: des na 'ga' zhig myong bzhin pa'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa gnyis su brjod pa 'thob bo //
translated: Therefore, it is possible to speak of the non-apprehension of some consciousness that is being experienced.

original: de ni rang gi yul las tha dad pa gzhan thams cad mi dmigs pa na de snang ba dang mi snang ba na rnam pa gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i phyir de dag der mi dmigs pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni rang gi yul las tha dad pa gzhan thams cad mi dmigs pa na de snang ba dang mi snang ba na rnam pa gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i phyir de dag der mi dmigs pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When it does not apprehend anything else that is different from its object, since it cannot transcend the two modes of appearance and non-appearance, the non-apprehension of those two is twofold.

original: de ltar gnyi ga yang yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gnyi ga yang yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, both the negation of the conventional existence of the object and the establishment of the conventional nonexistence of the object are accomplished.

original: de ltar zhes bya bas ni rnam pa 'dir brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya bas ni rnam pa 'dir brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word thus indicates the manner in which this is done.

original: rnam pa de yang gang zhe na rang dang bzlog pa'i rgyu med pa dang yod pa dag gi phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnam pa de yang gang zhe na rang dang bzlog pa'i rgyu med pa dang yod pa dag gi phyir zhes smos so //
translated: What is that manner? It is the statement, because of the nonexistence and existence of the cause of the object and its opposite, respectively.

original: bltar mi rung ba mi dmigs pa gcig la ni yod pa'i tha snyad rang gi rgyu dmigs pa med la /üîΩbltar rung ba dmigs pa la ni bzlog pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu snang ba mi dmigs pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: bltar mi rung ba mi dmigs pa gcig la ni yod pa'i tha snyad rang gi rgyu dmigs pa med la / bltar rung ba dmigs pa la ni bzlog pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu snang ba mi dmigs pa yod pa yin no //
translated: In the case of the nonapprehension of the imperceptible, there is no apprehension of the cause of the conventional existence of the object.üîΩIn the case of the apprehension of the perceptible, there is the apprehension of the cause of the conventional nonexistence of the object, which is the nonapprehension of the appearance of the cause of the object.

original: bzlog pa'i rgyu yang yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu med par grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: bzlog pa'i rgyu yang yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu med par grub pa nyid de /
translated: The cause of the conventional nonexistence of the object is established as the nonexistence of the cause of the conventional existence of the object.

original: de lta ma yin na de las bzlog pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de las bzlog pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, the existence of the cause of the object would not be established.

original: bzlog pa'i rgyu yod par bstan pa ni de'i rgyu med par bstan pa nyid kyi don te gzhan du na gnyi gar yang yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par mtshungs pa nyid du brjod pa na yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu med pa nyid brjod par bya bar 'gyur
analyzed: bzlog pa'i rgyu yod par bstan pa ni de'i rgyu med par bstan pa nyid kyi don te gzhan du na gnyi gar yang yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog par mtshungs pa nyid du brjod pa na yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu med pa nyid brjod par bya bar 'gyur
translated: The demonstration of the existence of a cause of the opposite is the very meaning of the demonstration of the nonexistence of its cause. Otherwise, when it is said that the negation of the convention of both is the same, the nonexistence of the cause of the convention of existence would have to be stated.

original: ba des na /
analyzed: ba des na /
translated: Therefore,

original: med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yod par tha snyad par ci bya /
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yod par tha snyad par ci bya /
translated: what use is there in stating the existence of the cause of the convention of nonexistence?

original: de nyid kyi phyir bzlog pa'i sgra nye bar bkod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bzlog pa'i sgra nye bar bkod do //
translated: For that very reason, the word ‚Äúopposite‚Äù is used.

original: rgyu med pa nyid du brjod par bya ba las 'di ltar brjod pa gang yin pa des ni snang ba mi dmigs pa gnyi ga'i sgrub par byed pa yin pa bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid du brjod par bya ba las 'di ltar brjod pa gang yin pa des ni snang ba mi dmigs pa gnyi ga'i sgrub par byed pa yin pa bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is to be stated that there is no cause, what is stated here is the proof of both the nonobservation of the cause and the observation of the opposite.

original: 'di med pa'i tha snyad de'i rgyu yod pa las byed pa dang / yod pa'i tha snyad de'i rgyu med pa las 'gog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di med pa'i tha snyad de'i rgyu yod pa las byed pa dang / yod pa'i tha snyad de'i rgyu med pa las 'gog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The convention of nonexistence is not made from the existence of its cause, and the convention of existence is not negated from the nonexistence of its cause.

original: byed pa gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there are not two agents.

original: 'on kyang med pa'i tha snyad grub pa nyid yod pa'i tha snyad bkag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang med pa'i tha snyad grub pa nyid yod pa'i tha snyad bkag pa yin te /
translated: However, the establishment of the term nonexistence is the negation of the term existence.

original: de grub na de 'jug par dogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de grub na de 'jug par dogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if the former is established, there is no doubt that the latter is engaged.

original: des na 'di'i yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog pa'i tshul mi 'dra ba yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di'i yod pa'i tha snyad 'gog pa'i tshul mi 'dra ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the method of negating the term existence is different.

original: de las bzlog pa sgrub pa'i sgo nas rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa sgrub pa'i sgo nas rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established by the method of establishing the opposite of that.

original: gang gi phyir sa phyogs dmigs pa nyid bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba bum pa dang sha za la sogs pa de dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa gcig nyid yul gnyis la ltos nas bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba
analyzed: gang gi phyir sa phyogs dmigs pa nyid bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba bum pa dang sha za la sogs pa de dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa gcig nyid yul gnyis la ltos nas bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba
translated: Because the very observation of a place is suitable or not suitable to be seen, such as a pot or a ghost, it is the nature of observation. Therefore, this nonobservation is one, but in dependence on two objects, it is suitable or not suitable to be seen.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa gnyis su gnas pa yin @41a * //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa gnyis su gnas pa yin @41a * //
translated: It is the nature of nonobservation that abides in two modes.

original: no ; / des na ji ltar 'di nyid snang ba mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa na bsgrub par bya ba bum pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa da bzhin du /
analyzed: no ; / des na ji ltar 'di nyid snang ba mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa na bsgrub par bya ba bum pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa da bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, just as this is the nature of the nonobservation of appearance, the object to be established is the nature of the nonexistence of a pot.

original: 'di nyid sha za la sogs pa yod pa'i shes pa dang sgra la sogs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid sha za la sogs pa yod pa'i shes pa dang sgra la sogs pa med pa yin no //
translated: This is the cognition of the existence of a flesh-eater, etc., and the non-existence of sound, etc.

original: sgrub pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po ni rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi don gyi mthar thug pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po ni rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi don gyi mthar thug pa yin no //
translated: The relation of probans and probandum is the ultimate object of a fixed nature.

original: des na yod pa'i tha snyad bkag pa ni dngos po med pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na yod pa'i tha snyad bkag pa ni dngos po med pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the negation of the convention of existence is not to be established by non-existence.

original: 'jug pa med pa ni 'di'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jug pa med pa ni 'di'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: Non-occurrence is not its effect,

original: de ni shes par byed pa'i chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni shes par byed pa'i chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not a property to be cognized.

original: 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba yang tshad ma'i byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba yang tshad ma'i byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Also, not to be engaged is not the function of a valid cognition.

original: de'i tshe der bsgrub par bya ba gang zhig yin /
analyzed: de'i tshe der bsgrub par bya ba gang zhig yin /
translated: Then, what is to be established there?

original: 'jug pa'am de med pa'am bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa'am de med pa'am bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: It is either engagement or the absence of that, or the meaning of action.

original: 'ga' yang srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' yang srid pa ma yin te /
translated: None is possible.

original: mi 'dod pa'i phyir dang bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i phyir dang brda las byung ba'i sgra la brten pa nyid kyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa'i phyir dang bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i phyir dang brda las byung ba'i sgra la brten pa nyid kyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not desired, because it is not to be accomplished, and because it is not a thing that is based on a sound that arises from a conventional symbol.

original: de'i phyir yod pa'i tha snyad bkag pa ni dngos po nyid yin la de yang gang yod na de mi srid pa de'i bzlog zlar gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa'i tha snyad bkag pa ni dngos po nyid yin la de yang gang yod na de mi srid pa de'i bzlog zlar gyur pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the negation of the convention of existence is a thing, and that is the opposite of that which is impossible when it exists.

original: de yang phyogs la sogs pa dmigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang phyogs la sogs pa dmigs pa nyid do //
translated: And that is the perception of direction, etc.

original: shes pa dang shes bya'i rang bzhin ni mi snang ba ma dmigs pas ni yongs ba'i tha snyad med pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya'i rang bzhin ni mi snang ba ma dmigs pas ni yongs ba'i tha snyad med pa yin te /
translated: The nature of consciousness and the object of consciousness is the non-perception of the non-appearance, because of the absence of the convention of existence.

original: de la mi snang ba mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang yod pa'i tha snyad mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mi snang ba mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang yod pa'i tha snyad mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the non-appearance is not understood in that, and because the convention of existence is impossible.

original: 'o na de grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Well, since it is established, it is not to be accomplished.

original: de ltar yin mod 'o na sgrub pa'i byed pa rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir shes pa la sogs pa med pa'i tha snyad nyid bsgrub byar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yin mod 'o na sgrub pa'i byed pa rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir shes pa la sogs pa med pa'i tha snyad nyid bsgrub byar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then since the activity of proof is the ultimate of understanding, the very expression ‚Äúdoes not exist‚Äù would be the probandum.

original: rigs pa brjod pa na gal te tshe dang ldan pas de ltar rtogs na de 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rigs pa brjod pa na gal te tshe dang ldan pas de ltar rtogs na de 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: When the reason is stated, if the venerable one understands it in that way, then that is what is intended.

original: rang dang bzlog pa'i rgyu med pa dang yod pa nyid ston te /
analyzed: rang dang bzlog pa'i rgyu med pa dang yod pa nyid ston te /
translated: It shows that the reason is not present in the dissimilar instance and is present in the similar instance.

original: bltar mi rung ba mi dmigs pa gcig la ni yod par the tshom yod pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: bltar mi rung ba mi dmigs pa gcig la ni yod par the tshom yod pa'i phyir la /
translated: In the case of non-apprehension of the imperceptible, there is doubt as to whether it exists.

original: mi dmigs pa gzhan la ni bzlog pa'i phyir de med do zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa gzhan la ni bzlog pa'i phyir de med do zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the case of other non-apprehensions, there is the opposite, and so it is understood that it does not exist.

original: gal te 'dir yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yod na ni the tshom yod par mi 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: gal te 'dir yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yod na ni the tshom yod par mi 'gyur ro ;
translated: If there were a reason for the expression ‚Äúexists here,‚Äù there would be no doubt.

original: / des na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir 'dir rang gi rgyu med par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: / des na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir 'dir rang gi rgyu med par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is no effect, here the absence of its cause is stated.

original: phyi mar yang bzlog pa'i rtogs pa yod pa nyid kyis bzlog pa'i rgyu yod par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: phyi mar yang bzlog pa'i rtogs pa yod pa nyid kyis bzlog pa'i rgyu yod par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: And in the future, the existence of the cause of the negation is established by the mere existence of the realization of the negation.

original: gal te mi snang ba mi dmigs pa la med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu med pa yod pa nyid de de la snang ba mi dmigs pa med pa'i phyir dang / de'i @41b rgyu yang de nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te mi snang ba mi dmigs pa la med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu med pa yod pa nyid de de la snang ba mi dmigs pa med pa'i phyir dang / de'i @41b rgyu yang de nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the non-appearance of non-apprehension is the cause of the designation of non-existence, then it is not non-existence, because the non-apprehension of appearance does not exist there, and because that is the cause of that.

original: des na med pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can du yang brjod par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na med pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can du yang brjod par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it should be said that it has the effect of negating the designation of non-existence.

original: bden te bkod pa ni nye bar bstan pa'i don yin pa'i phyir brjod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bden te bkod pa ni nye bar bstan pa'i don yin pa'i phyir brjod pa kho na'o //
translated: It is true, but since the arrangement is the object of indication, it is indeed expressed.

original: rigs pa brjod pa na de dang khyad par med pa ma brjod kyang mi rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs pa brjod pa na de dang khyad par med pa ma brjod kyang mi rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When stating the reasoning, even if something without distinction is not stated, it is not that it is not understood.

original: mi dmigs pa gnyis bo de la mi snang ba mi dmigs pa ni ji skad brjod pa'i don nyid la tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa gnyis bo de la mi snang ba mi dmigs pa ni ji skad brjod pa'i don nyid la tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: Regarding those two non-apprehensions, the non-appearance non-apprehension is a valid cognition in regard to just the meaning that is stated.

original: gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa mthong ba dang / stsogs pa'i sgras sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa med par bsgrub pa la nye bar sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa mthong ba dang / stsogs pa'i sgras sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa med par bsgrub pa la nye bar sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúand so on‚Äù indicates that the contrapositive of the reason is not applied to prove the absence of a mind free from attachment and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: the tshom yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩma rtogs pa tsam gyis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems sam /
analyzed: the tshom yod pa'i phyir ro // ma rtogs pa tsam gyis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems sam /
translated: Because there is doubt.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med do zhes nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med do zhes nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The mere nonapprehension of a mind free from attachment or the nonexistence of the object of negation does not ascertain the absence of the reason.

original: gnyis pa ni gtan tshigs kyis ldog pa dang don gzhan med pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa de la tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni gtan tshigs kyis ldog pa dang don gzhan med pa la sogs pa bsgrub pa de la tshad ma yin te /
translated: The second is a valid means of knowledge in regard to proving the contrapositive and the absence of another object and so on.

original: nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it has a definite result.

original: nges pa'i 'bras bu can nyid tshad ma yin no zhes bya bar bsam pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i 'bras bu can nyid tshad ma yin no zhes bya bar bsam pa'o //
translated: The idea is that having a definite result is a valid means of knowledge.

original: gal te ldog pa ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa las ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa las ma yin te /
translated: The contrapositive is not from the nonapprehension of the nature.

original: 'on kyang rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag las ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag las ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not from the nonapprehension of the cause and the pervader?

original: bden na 'on kyang de'i khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir de gnyis 'di ltar bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: bden na 'on kyang de'i khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir de gnyis 'di ltar bstan pa yin te /
translated: Although it is true that the latter two are included in the former two, they are taught as two in order to show that they are included in the latter two.

original: de'i rigs can de nyid kyi khongs su bsdus par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rigs can de nyid kyi khongs su bsdus par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The former two are included in the latter two.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa snang ba mi dmigs pa yin gyi dang po ni ma yin no snyam du bsam pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa snang ba mi dmigs pa yin gyi dang po ni ma yin no snyam du bsam pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means that the second, the non-apprehension of appearance, is included in the latter two, but the first is not.

original: rnam bzhi zhes bya ba ni dbye ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: rnam bzhi zhes bya ba ni dbye ba bzhi'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúfour‚Äù means four types.üîΩWhy are the four types of non-apprehension taught as the means of accomplishing the four types of object of apprehension?

original: 'di'i dbye ba nyid du bstan pa gang yin pa de dag sgrub par byed pa gzhan nyid du ci ste mi gzhag /
analyzed: 'di'i dbye ba nyid du bstan pa gang yin pa de dag sgrub par byed pa gzhan nyid du ci ste mi gzhag /
translated: Why are they not taught as other means of accomplishment?

original: mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba nyid du ci'i phyir gzhag ce na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba nyid du ci'i phyir gzhag ce na /
translated: Why are they taught as the types of non-apprehension?

original: sbyor ba'i bye brag gis zhes smos te 'dir sbyor ba kho na tha dad kyis sbyar bar bya ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir de tha dad med pas gcig nyid do //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i bye brag gis zhes smos te 'dir sbyor ba kho na tha dad kyis sbyar bar bya ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir de tha dad med pas gcig nyid do //
translated: The word ‚Äúdistinction‚Äù is used because the distinction of application is different. The object of application is not different, so it is one.

original: sbyor ba gzhan nyid kyis ni rnam pa du ma tsam nyid pas de ji ltar sgrub byed gzhan nyid yin /
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan nyid kyis ni rnam pa du ma tsam nyid pas de ji ltar sgrub byed gzhan nyid yin /
translated: If it is different in terms of application, it is merely many types. How can it be different in terms of means of accomplishment?

original: rnam pa'i bye brag de nyid bshad pa ni 'gal dang 'bras bu dag ces bya'o //
